column2: I was very hesitant about buying an iPhone off of Amazon, but I did it and was not disappointed. It came with 100% battery life, so it basically was brand new. It came with a charger and cube (plug), but that's it. Sorry to disappoint those who into that airpod life.No scratches and shipped fairly quickly. The only complaint I have for the iPhone XS, in general, is that I really liked the fingerprint scan, sometimes the face recognition doesn't work when you're looking down. But what it lacks in that feature, the iPhone delivers in the portrait camera mode, I seriously am in love with the blur feature.Sincerely,A very satisfied Amazon customer

column1: Beautiful, lovely, practically brand new iPhone XS!
column2: I absolutely love my new iPhone XS! It arrived on time and practically brand new. The battery health is at 95% so it’s practically a brand new battery in here. It’s a very beautiful looking phone and is very responsive especially with the face recognition. That works very well even in low light settings, or if you have sunglasses and a hat on. I was surprised at how accurate that was. The battery lasts all day easily and I’ve hardly had any issues with apps crashing or anything like that.The phone itself was flawless and came with a protective film over it. There’s no scratches or signs of wear or anything to be found on the phone which I thought was great especially since it is an Amazon renewed item!I would definitely recommend this for anybody that is looking to upgrade their phone. The one I got is fully unlocked to GSM and CDMA networks so you can use it for any cell phone provider as long as you have a SIM card which it does not come with. It does come with a SIM tool as well as a generic charger and short cable which I just have tucked away as spares.

One - It comes in a weird boxTwo it had more scuffs and scratches than I’d like for the price3 - I had to return it because of how over all lame it came and how it showed up/ battery was pretty warn/scratches/ and I didn’t get the awesome feeling of unboxing it..
The phone is froze up and unable to use. Very poor product*Edit* within five minutes of talking with Amazon tech support the started working just fine

column1: Its not expensive when you compare with other brand and operating systems. Thks.
column2: Thanks , i feeling very nice satisfacción with a new cellphone. Look like brand new.

column1: Did not come with EarPods and Adapter
column2: Phone was in perfect condition and works great but came without EarPods and the the lightning to earphone jack adapter that is pictured with “what’s in the box”.If you must replace these, the $20 open box discount is not worth it. If I did not already have Bluetooth headphones, and received Amazon Visa discount points, I would have returned.
Suddenly Wifi is not working properly and i could see phone feels hot with calls dropping abruptly . I am really not sure of what to do .

column1: WISH I COULD GIVE THEM ZERO
column2: WISH I COULD GIVE THEM ZERO! NEGATIVE EXPERIENCE

column1: I recieved the xs MAX, not the xs like advertised.
column2: First off I’m going to say that I recieved and iPhone xs MAX, not the standard xs like it’s advertised. Not a big deal to me, but it might be to some people. Also as the other review states, it comes with a charger but not the headphones or the headphone adapter.Other than that it looks brand new and came very quickly! Overall very satisfied. Honestly though, since this is the same price as a new xs, I would probably recommend just buying a brand new one instead.

column1: NOT LEGIT IPHONE. CHEAP KNOCKOFF According to Apple Store
column2: To my dismay, my phone started getting VERY hot for no reason, then my screen started going out. I took it to Apple and they asked me "Where did you get this fixed?". I was confused. They said that BOTH the SCREEN and BATTERY were NOT APPLE, and instead were cheap replacement parts, and that they wouldn't service it. I'm not out $500 that I paid for a cheap knockoff. I suspected this might be the case because the screen was... bland, and the XS is supposed to have a magnificent "OLED" screen.This is 3.5 months after purchase.Pros: It did come with a nice screen protector on it. It also worked with my ATT sim card.I don't know if this is an Amazon wide problem, or if it's just this seller, but I feel like I've been scammed. All I know is I paid for something and got a cheap knockoff that died. I'm actually a law student and you can bet as soon as I pass the bar, I'm filing an "implied warranty" suit out of principal; look it up if you've ever been told something is "out of warranty" but feel like it was 'supposed' to last at least that long.

It's compatible with my carrier (metro by t-mobile) all I had to do was ask. It doesn't appear to have any preexisting problems. I switched over from android and to my surprise it didn't take long to get fully acclimated to iOS (maybe a day or two). I forget what shipping option I chose (I think 1 day or something) but it arrived pretty quickly (within US i believe), definitely worth the extra bucks.

Was nervous ordering refurbished but I cannot see any evidence it was ever touched. Battery shows 100% capacity, no scratches or marks anywhere and fully unlocked, tried sprint, att, and cricket Sim and all register and operate without issue.

My husband has a bad habit of dropping his phone. He’s broken so many androids. Finally got him the iPhone XS and a case. Has dropped it many times and it’s still kicking. Over 6 months and still holding up!
iPhones have a great reputation for being tough.My son has had androids for years. I would always get him the cheapest ones because he would constantly break them. Case or no case. I finally upgraded my iPhone 5S to an iPhone XS and passed my old one to him and it lasted for 2 years. iPhone 5S is no longer compatible with our cell company so I had to upgrade his phone. I got him an iPhone XS as well (wasn’t giving up mine).First day I got my iPhone XS, we went to the water park. I didn’t want to leave it in the car or on the side lines, so I tried being careful as I carried it with me in the pool (stupid, I know). It fell in and was at the 4 foot depth for about 30 seconds before I could pull it out. No case. Still works great!We all have the 256gb size and none of us have used more than 60gb yet. I’ve had mine for 3 1/2 years, my son has had his for almost 2 years and my husband has had his for 6 months.

column1: The Phone is not in EXCELLENT CONDITION
column2: Mine had a cracked camera flash in the back side. I returned it immediately as I received it. Absolute waste of time and energy. why would Amazon allow these kind of low quality stuff.And you need to pay for the return, of a faulty product

column1: Overall Very Happy With My Purchase from buySPRY
column2: I was skeptical about this at first, but I’m glad I bought the phone in the end. I read a lot of reviews that said the phone didn’t work or had varying things wrong with it, but I think most people go into this expecting a new phone with no damage whatsoever to the outside. However, if you read the product description carefully, it’ll tell you everything you need to know. I got lucky because there are no scratches or dents anywhere on the phone I received, but even if there had been some, I don’t think I would care. You’re paying $400 for a flagship phone, so expecting some minimal cosmetic damage is not a bad idea.I love this phone. Face recognition works great, the screen is vibrant and I can see a stark contrast in the colors when compared to my old iPhone 7+. I was hoping to get a newer battery, but I only got 83%. However, I don’t have an issue with that, because worst case scenario, I get the battery replaced for $70 at the Apple store, and I’m still paying less for this phone than I would pay for a new Xs or other newer iPhone.Overall, I can really only speak for buySPRY, but I really recommend buying from them. It’s a great phone, and I plan on having it for a long time.

I’m content with what I got, but I think it should be more obvious that Amazon’s definition of refurbished is not the same as Apple’s definition. This item came with a battery at 88% of max capacity. I asked the vendor about their policy toward batteries in refurbished iPhone and they stated anything greater than 80% of max capacity is within Amazon’s guidelines.I am content with that for an iPhone XS 256gb at the $567 price point. I see the 256 GB model is now up to $599 which makes the battery comprise just a bit harder to swallow.The XS is a huge upgrade from my 7 and my wife’s 8 Plus. It was worth the price. Just beware of the battery consideration and make an informed choice. The screen is gorgeous!

I received my iPhone a few weeks ago and wanted to wait some time to use the phone before iI posted my review. I generally don't post reviews, but I felt this one needed a 'thumbs up'. My iPhone was delivered pretty quickly in a white box - not an official Apple iPhone box. They even provided the necessary tool to change sim-cards from phone to phone, which was useful. Battery life is fairly good and lasts me most of the day in the office (I'm always listening to music and on my phone for work)Overall, I love it and I'm glad I went through Amazon instead of Facebook Marketplace.

column1: Premium Apple product without the premium price
column2: I switched to this phone from a Samsung galaxy S8+.As an iPad user, I was attracted to the continuous ecosphere Apple offered.There was a mild hiccup in transfer, as all my sorted photos transferred into a single album on the iPhone. After some sorting, though, I have no regrets whatsoever.The capability of this phone, despite it being one model year old, is striking (Many of its features are superior even to the current iPhone 11, including the OLED screen).The battery life has been better than expected for a renewed device, likely because it is only one model year old.I have larger hands, but I prefer the 5.8 inch size for one-handed use.If you are looking for a foray into the Apple ecosphere, this opportunity is hard to beat.

column1: iPhone XS flawless case. Great hardware
column2: So happy with my iPhone XS Battery is at a 90% screen is flawless. Back glass is flawless. Face ID works. So far I’m happy. You get 90 Day with amazon and also from the seller.happy Happy Happy.

Screen is amazing. Had to have OLED. It’s the only reason I didn’t want the XR.
Feels premium in every way.Wasn’t sure if I was going to keep it but it took about a day to know I could never give it up.It came well packaged with off brand charger. But the cord is really nice considering.Minor scuffs on metal and tiny scuff on bottom back glass. I was really really happy it was in such great condition. 89% battery.I hate that I love apple so much now. I had a Mac as a kid and kinda forgot how beautiful their OS and build quality is. But damn the cult of Mac entry fee is intimidating. And tbh it doesn’t replace windows for everything. But I’m slowly but surely going to own the entire ecosystem. And felt like and iPhone 7 wasn’t going to cut it. I’m really grateful my bf let me buy this. I hope you experience buying a refurbished iOS device is as great as mine was!Also be sure to order from an amazon endorsed seller, they give you more time to decide/be sure the device isn’t faulty.

Really nice quality. If you’re looking for a basically new phone, but don’t need the latest and greatest model, don’t hesitate to get this as it’s well worth the price. The phone looks almost new upon arrival, there were only very small scuffs on the edge of the screen. They were too small for me to even consider them scratches. And once I put a screen protector on, I don’t even see them. Obviously, if you want an absolutely perfect phone, maybe this isn’t for you. The battery health was at 92% when it arrived; I’m upgrading from an iPhone 6, so both the battery life and phone overall are a huge upgrade. If you’re new to buying a phone on Amazon like I was, I can confirm that the fully unlocked version of this phone does work with a Verizon SIM (I was a bit worried about that, the whole CDMA vs GSM thing goes well over my head). Anyway, overall really happy with this purchase thus far, I’ll update this review if anything happens.

This renewed iPhone XS arrived from the seller Buy SPRY in perfect condition with 93% battery health. Included aftermarket box, compatible wall charger and cable with instructions.I spoke to associate before purchase and asked if this is fully unlocked and if will work with Sprint(Boost Mobile) since the description and details were contradicting each other. I was reinsured that it will work with Sprint CDMA network since is fully unlocked. When I received the phone, read included instructions there was a part in the bottom stating that this device is only compatible with GSM network for T MOBILE and ATT. Went step further and verified using devices sn# on network provider’s website and came back with the same massage stating this device is NOT compatible.Make the story short, it took a call to network provider customer service, explain the story that this is fully unlocked phone and pleading that it should work. Took the service rep about 5 min to make it compatible but could not use my existing SIM card nor other two spare ones. Had to wait few days for new SIM card to be sent. Once I got the new SIM card and went thru easy on-line activation, I was making phone calls with in 5 minutes.I recommend the renewed phone to any one who doesn’t want to pay ridicules price of new device and has little patience if same issue happens.

I purchased the iphone xs 256 gb in silver gray from the seller called:Verizon Pre-OwnedThe item was shipped fedex. In a box. With a aftermarket charger. The charger is acceptable. Delivered before estimated delivery date. Phone is in excellent shape. No signs of wear. Everything works. I had no problem having service hooked up. I was super nervous ordering a preowned phone through amazon. Some of the reviews can be scary. This was my 1st time. I will probably do it again. Just make sure you look up the seller and their reviews.The phone itself was for my daughter. Upgrading from the 7. The face id, battery life, lack of a home button, are all wonderfull to her. The screen is nice but big to her. The camera is amazing. She can not stop talking about the camera. I hope this review helps anyone on the fence about ordering pre-owned on amazon. Or the iphone xs itself.

I bought this phone back in December of 2019 and intentionally waited a few months to write a review to see how the phone behaved over time.Before buying the renewed iPhone XS off of Amazon, I had only bought brand new apple products from the Apple store. I would have never considered using an alternative site, until Apple raised it's prices on Apple Care. I have needed repairs on most of my Apple Products due to dropping my devices. I have no hate for Apple, but charging $250 for Apple care on phones is just not an option for me.I took a leap of faith and bought this version from Amazon. My XS came in the mail a few days later than expected (originally giving me the "oh-crap-I-just-got-scammed" feeling). Besides a few smudges which came off with some rubbing alcohol and the world's tiniest scratch--keep in mind, the renewed iPhones on amazon have to look like new from an arm's length away-- this phone is perfect.I genuinely have 0 complaints. The phone's battery has been consistent, I charge it for about 2-3 hours every 24-36 hours if I'm using the phone heavily throughout the day, and every 48 if not. It works flawlessly--it hasn't crashed, given me error messages, or refused to update (I've heard some horror stories about refurbished phones). Best of all, Amazon offers their own version of repair care for only $88.99 (comparable to Apple's old policy).Overall, if you're like me and you don't need the latest version of smartphones, but know you need an accident protection plan, then just get the Amazon renewed iPhones. It will save you hundreds of dollars and is absolutely worth it!

column1: I definitely do not regret this purchase!
column2: If you want to buy an iPhone and you don't mind being a couple generations behind, or have to purchase a 2nd hand one, I have absolutely no problems with my purchase and completely recommend this purchase. The iPhone arrived without any visible scratches, scuffs, dings or dents. It honestly looked like a brand new iPhone XS.Battery Health was at 81%.I did not see any SIM removal tool in my box but that does not affect my rating. it works with my SIM (I'm sure you see the, 'LTE,' in some of the photos.)I don't know who these 1 star guys are here but you have seen my proof. Check out the photos to see what I got and what you too can also own!

This is the third iPhone we have purchased from Hybrid IT. Each one arrived in perfect condition and were flawless in appearance. We have had no issues from the first two but this iPhone XS battery dipped down under 80% on the battery health meter within the first month. I contacted them and received a prompt response (on a holiday weekend). They offered me the choice of refund, exchange, or replace the battery and receive a refund. No hassles. I cannot speak for other sellers, but Hybrid IT definitely cares about satisfied customers.

The battery arrived at 92% capacity. I wish it had a better battery as I have to charge it twice a day. The Face ID Works, it came in a 3rd party box, with a 3rd party charger. I don’t mind that too much as I am gonna go out and buy a braided cable charger and also I mostly use wireless charging anyways. It has an original display as True Tone works, the camera is great, and this is the phone that I switched from Samsung to Apple with becaus the price was just so damn great!

column1: Highly  highly recommended Iphone XS silver.
column2: Highly recommended.It was my first purchase of a renewed cell phone from amazon and I can only tell you it was worth it. I recommend it especially to all people who do not have the budget to buy a new one.I have read the most comments from seller "BuySPRY" and buyers to make the decision to buythis cell phone. Most of the negative comments readed, in my opinion, are from very demanding people and they HAVEN'T read the policy and / or product description.The article arrived without any detail and with 92% battery life which in my opinion very good for a Renewed cell phone. Everything is working so far.

Bought the unlocked iphone xs from BuySPRY (just included sellers name if others are less consistent).the phone was in perfect condition, couldn't tell it apart from new. Battery health was 91%. No issues at all.The box it came in was in some box for another chinese phone. But im just mentioning that, its a non issue

I received my renewed iPhone XS quickly after ordering it (24 hours) and it arrived in a dinky little box. Amongst the poor reviews were those who had too purchased a renewed/refurbished iPhones and were let down with very poor phone conditions and battery life.Much to my delight I was happy to see that the phone I purchased was in great condition. No noticeable scratches on the screen or back-glass. It felt brand-new. What reminded me it was not brand new was the 85% maximum battery life. Apart from that small downside, the phone works great with my existing SIM card from my old phone and it transfered all of my data and apps flawlessly.Great purchase from someone who was nervous about buying a $350 phone renewed.

Worked flawlessly after charging. I thought it would come with some battery life so I had a mini heart attack when it didn’t turn on but once charged everything worked great and I transitioned everything from my old phone with no problems. I upgraded from the X because I had a messed up screen and the battery life sucked. So far the battery life on the xs seems to be slightly better which is okay given that it’s basically the same exact model as the X internally. The only thing I’ve had come up is that the flashlight seems to be a slightly cooler tone and dimmer than before? It could be a trick of the mind, maybe I had a dirty flashlight before, or it has to do with it being refurbished but it just feels a little different than the one on the X I had. Not a big issue just something I noticed. I haven’t taken too many photos that needed flash so idk if it effects the tone of the photos, but even if it does that’s fixable in editing.

I ordered a 256GB iPhone XS on a Thursday to replace my 64GB iPhone 8. I received the “Renewed” iPhone on Monday.Cosmetically, there is a very slight scuff on the back which is barely noticeable. There was a small sticker with a barcode on the back that was very easily removed. The screen already had a glass screen protector installed. Long story, short, someone loved this phone.Battery life was 84%, and it holds a charge.I backed up my iPhone 8 through iTunes, then updated iOS on the new phone before restoring. Seamless. I’d very much recommend buying one of these vs. full price.

Reasonable delivery time:ordered on 1/4, delivered on 1/9.Phone received in excellent condition.No case scratches, scuffs, or dings.Screen had one very small, very light swirl scuff that isn’t noticeable unless held in a certain position with the device turned off.When device is on and screen is displaying the scuff is not visible.Should also note that the scuff totally disappeared when I placed the tempered glass screen protector on the unit.Most importantly, phone is fully functional.Phone received with an indicated battery life of 87% maximum capacity, which I find acceptable for a “refreshed” phone.Considering a “refurbished” unit from Apple’s site was considerably more than this unit’s cost, I think this phone was a good deal.Also, the fact that this purchase falls under the Amazon Renewed Guarantee (check it out) provided me with enough confidence to take a chance on buying a renewed product from Amazon.This phone was an upgrade for me from an iPhone 6, and after using the content transfer process to get the iPhone 6 content to the new phone, simply taking the micro-SIM chip out of the iPhone 6 and installing it in the iPhone XS completed upgrade process since I was staying with Verizon.This worked flawlessly and I was immediately using the new phone with the content exactly as it was on the old phone.Bottom line:This purchase of an Amazon Renewed iPhone worked out well for me.I would consider going this route again for a phone and/or other items I might need.Also, I would purchase again from the CellCow vendor as they delivered the product as advertised.

I unboxed the phone and it looked like a brand new one. I think I made a great purchase. The phone activated flawlessly, apps loaded easily, my Apple Watch connected and the watch activated to cellular with no problems. The battery health is at 80 percent full capacity so I will need to get the battery replaced soon but as of now, I haven’t had a problem with the battery totally depleting yet. I amRetired so I’m not on the go and using it 90 percent of the day the way I would have been while working.Overall, I am super happy with my purchase.

I waited just about a year to leave a review so I could fully get a feel for the quality and life of the phone. Overall, I’m impressed! A year later and my phone functions just as well as it did when I first got it. The battery life is fine, the camera is outstanding, and I have no problems with functionality. Super impressed with this phone

The product was good. The only issue was that the charging brick was pretty bad, but I already had a 100 Watt charger anyways so it was alright. The phone was exactly as listed, the only issue I had was the 87% battery capacity and the ear piece speaker. But once I gave the phone a good clean with alcohol and cotton swabs, it was legit LOUDER than my 2 year old 11 pro max. It might be because my iPhone 11 Pro Max has been through a lot of things and a lot of water mostly salt water. Other than that the phone was 256 GB, and the color matched, it even came with a free screen protector, but unfortunately I never use cases or screen protectors. But I could see that as an advantage because the screen did have a handful of scratches. But it’s not a dealbreaker. Ever had to give the phone he waiting I’ll give it is solid 7/10. That’s because of the scratches, earpiece speaker, and the crappy charger. But the phone service and I’m pretty sure A person who I’m gifting it to be very happy!

column1: Impressed with my phone and the seller!
column2:
WOW! I’m a very skeptical shopper. I thought the description and the price for my phone was too good to be true. My phone was an exact match of the description and I could not be happier. Absolutely spotless, free of marks or scratches.
The battery life is currently the same what would be on a new phone.Impressed with the seller’s ability to match a description with the product.I was very skeptical since pictures were not even posted of the phone.I just shopped for months and went with the best seller reviews. Which is why I am choosing to leave you with my experience.No doubt I will buy from this seller again.

column1: Perfect budget option to start LiveStreaming
column2: I chose MobileSupply to order this Renewed iPhone XS from as they had excellent reviews.I was not disappointed, the phone arrived promptly, a signature was required, and it is perfect condition and fully unlocked.Phone came with a compatible power cord and brick.Very happy, we are using this to livestream our church service, paired with an iRig Stream (running passthrough via the iRig app).The 2x of the phone camera is just enough to get a nice wideshot of the stage from our soundbooth.Battery health was 80%, but we don't care.....we are using it powered via the iRig power pack (which only works for lightening port devices.)

column1: so far i’m surprised- in a good way
column2: buying an iphone off of amazon seems suspicious. i’ve been using this phone for a week and i have not noticed any problems , cross my fingers and hope that i never run into any, the face recognition is alright it’s about what you would expect. the screen is beautiful, no scratches or anything. the outside of the phone was flawless, no dinks , scraps or anything. it charges beautifully, had 100% battery capacity. this was like a brand new phone and i’m very pleased. it wasn’t a stolen phone or anything as i was able to make an apple id with no issues. one thing is that the phone does get a little warm but honestly if you’re using your phone as chronically as a teenage girl like i am then it’s good.

So far this iPhone XS appears to be great value. It arrived in box in like new condition. No scratches on screen. Box included a charger and cord. Also had a screen protector sheet that I applied immediately. Thought that was nice feature that was not clearly stated as part of purchase. Cool. Box also had paper clip device for removing sim card out of slot. Took a while to get data and info transferred from my i6S phone over to the iXS, but that was not an issue with new phone. Note: Check the phone you buy to make sure it is updated with latest version of iOS or at least make sure it is same version as phone you are transferring from. Also ordered up an Otter box to protect.

Recieved Iphone Xs within days of placing order and was impressed by its' condition. it appeared new, in its' original packaging, without a trace of wear. it looked so new that I was afraid to smear my fingerprints all over it so I put on latex gloves until I was able to purchase a proper case with crystal. Transferring my stuff from my Iphone 6 was seamless. I was floored by how both phones synchronized until the transfer was completed. However, the battery only had a life capacity of 85% but this phone should still last me a good 5 to six years. I left the phone unplugged from one day to the next and the battery still appeared full. Hats off to O & M wireless. They provided me with a quality product.

I had qualms about ordering this after reading a few of the negative reviews, but went ahead in consideration of the generous return policy. The package arrivedin three days, to my surprise, and turned out to be in perfect operational order. It did have a very small scuff mark on the back, which is pf no concern. I did find that I am in the camp that prefers touch ID, but face ID works as it should. Overall. A spectacular purchase for a spendid price. I have reason at all to want an iPhone 11 at twice the price.

This phone came out in excellent condition, not a single scratch on the screen nor the back, not even near the lightning port, physically looks brand new. And in regards of functionality, everything works perfect, the camera and face recognition work great, the screen quality 100%, it picks good wifi and cellular signal,my new airpods pro work amazing with it and the best of all, it came with 99% battery health, which exceeded my expectations.
Item was exactly as described “looks and works like new”. i’m so pleased with my purchase I would give 5 stars to BuySPRY.

column1: Very nice quality for the price
column2: I saw a lot of reviews that mentioned a lot of bad things involved with these phones. I received it and it was in excellent condition. It came with a screen protector and I eventually also bought a case for it. No scratches in the front and rear of the phone. Battery life is excellent from all day experience and the battery settings menu on the iPhone. I honestly love it. My fiancé has used my phone as well and loves it and I’m considering getting her as well. As a matter of a fact I might actually buy her the same phone tonight. Anywho, I love it. It’s been a month and it’s going great.

I was skeptical due to some of the negative reviews, but I refuse to spend over $1000 on a phone. I could not be happier with this phone! Of course for the price you don’t get the EarPods, but you do get an aftermarket charger and cable (which are better than the factory cube because it’s higher output and charges much faster.) I upgraded from an old busted up 7plus. There are no scratches or any noticeable defects at all. The battery still has 86% of its life. Apple makes it so easy to switch to a new iPhone, and with 256GB I will never run out of storage.If you’re on the fence about this one, I highly recommend buying it. Best decision I’ve made in a long time!

no es la primera vez que realizo compra de celular remanufacturado/renovado, pero a pesar de esto siempre tengo miedo de que vaya a recibir un equipo enmal estado o con problemas tecnicos, por lo que recomiendo leer de manera minusiona los comentarios y calificaciones del producto y vendedor antes de comprar.
En este caso, aun no puedo confirmar su durabilidadporque lo he estado usando hace dossemanas, pero en este poco tiempo no ha presentado novedades.Lo pude configurar sin novedad,la batería me vino al 92% vino desbloqueado tal como lo solicite así que lo pude activar con la compaía de telefónica celular de mi pais (Ecuador), la pantalla en excelente estado y físicamentesolo tenia un pequeo rayón a un costado asi que para mi hasta el momento ha sido una muy buena compra!!

Arrived a day early and in flawless condition. It even had tempered glass screen protector on it. Battery condition is 100%, all features work as new, you wouldn't be able to look at this phone vs. a new phone from the factory and tell a difference. You can't expect perfection when you're buying renewed (refurbished) items, but that's what I got.

column1: Great Battery Life, Brilliant Display, Great Camera
column2: I bought this phone mainly for work. The battery lasts throughout the workday while I'm making calls, browsing the web, and managing social media accounts.I upgraded from an iPhone 7+ and the XS has a larger screen, but the phone itself is smaller and easier to use with one hand. After getting used to the lack of a home button, I've also noticed that I can do the same operations faster than before.The camera quality is great, especially in portrait mode. It really accentuates the details, and the built-in editor makes it easy to quickly edit and post photos.The video quality is also great for a phone. It's more than capable of shooting short films in 4k or 1080p (although it would help to have accessories).Finally, I love the seamless integration of Apple products. I can easily work on a project by going back and forth between my MacBook Pro and iPhone, and when I'm on the go and don't feel like taking my phone everywhere, I can simply wear my apple watch and keep up with notifications and stay in touch with friends and family.

I was a little leery of buying a used iPhone off Amazon however I am so glad that I did! My XS arrived just as described, and looks brand new. It took me a little while to set up (user error) - and now it is working great. I simploy popped the SIM card out of my 8 and put into my new phone. I had looked at an iPhone 11 as well however when comparing the 11 and XS features, the two are almost identical other than the 11 being more expensive. I was able to get 256G for the same price I would 64g had I bought elsewhere. I wish prime shipping had been available but product did arrive when expected. Overall super happy with this purchase!!

I loved that it arrived earlier than expected!!! I also think it’s a beautiful iPhone but unfortunately it’s a little too small for me n will be returning it. If u like a small phone then this iPhone XS is for you . It’s beautiful n works wonderfully. The company I bought from,Buyspry, in my opinion, is a reputable company n really hate that I have to return it. All n all it’s a beautiful iPhone n they kindly excepted me returning it. I would definitely order anything with their name on it. Customer service was excellent. You will not go wrong with this seller .

column1: Wow! This beat my expectations by a mile.
column2: I was expecting, for the price, a phone that would barely meet a good condition standard. Instead this thing was mint! Has the original screen with no scratches or signs of wear what so ever! Beautiful device! The battery did have 86% health on it but when my wife can’t take anymore I’m more than happy to pay the $70 battery replacement fee from Apple. This phone made me a believer in buying Amazon renewed phones! Couldn’t be happier.

Item was delivered earlier than expected and in beautiful condition - no visible scratches or marks of any kind. Looks completely new. Generic charger & box - very basic, nothing special, but I wasn't expecting anything special coming from a renewed product. Battery health was at 94%, set up and restore from backup was fast and easy. Very satisfied with this purchase.

I upgraded to an ads from and iPhone 5 so my appreciation of the upgrade may be more than others, but I can’t be happier with this phone. The battery is long lasting, even when I’m using google maps all day, the screen came in amazing condition and the body of the phone has some scuffs but hard to see in the wrong light. If you’re planning to put the phone in a case the the minor stuff won’t matter. Great phone, works like new, and saved me about $300.

Purchased this iPhone XS as a Christmas gift for my son. I’ve purchased used iPhones from eBay and none have ever been in this good condition. Packaged very well, also included a wall charger and cord. It did come with a screen protector but it’s a little too large for the screen (see picture). Unsure if that was intentional or a mistake.Battery health is at 84% which isn’t bad at all. No scratches or dead pixels. Would definitely buy again!

I was really hesitant to buy a phone online, but I have been very happy with the phone so far. The phone shipped quickly (like 2 days) and came with accessories I wasn’t expecting. A charger and a screen protector were included with the phone! There was a small chip on the bottom left corner of the phone, but a case will cover it up so it’s not a big deal to me. Other than that, the phone looked brand new! According to the box, the battery capacity was 90%, but when I opened the phone it was only 88%. I wish the battery capacity was a little higher, but the phone is in such nice condition that it’s not a real problem. Overall, I would say the purchase was worth the risk!

column1: Refurbished yet, it looks new.  Good investment and Saved one for Earth
column2: I was skeptical to buy the refurbished from Amazon an Apple phone for my Son.But not until when the product arrived.It had no scratch, dent or damage.that's the first thing I checked.The product packaging was as good as any amazon packing and with instructions of green package, it made me comfortable that amazon did take care of refurbished product.Added to this the seller gave a case and screen guard which helped me not to find another product.The only drawback was the original charger was missing.

I waited not to long for I phone to arrive to me. Living in Canada takes time to receive delivery from USA.Phone in itself in perfect condition just around lightning connection very small evidence of scratches that’s all. So far very happy with phone and seller. Only one thing not being perfect is battery life % which is 86%. Well is not 100% but still is ok for the price paid. Phone super fast and all other futures works well. Transferring myself from I phone 8 plus. This phone is a bit smaller but in reality screen is bigger with no surprises what so ever. Let’s see what future brings. Five stars for seller towards the product selling as almost new.

column1: A Great Value on a Used Phone in Excellent Condition
column2: I admit I was a bit anxious about buying a used cellphone because there are so many ways for it to turn out bad, but I am happy to say my fears were not realized. In fact the phone arrived earlier than Amazon predicted and the condition of the phone was better than promised. There are no marks or scratches on the device except for a couple of very faint scratches on the front screen that I can only see in bright lighting, at the right angle and from very close range. At arms length it looks brand new, and with a glass screen protector installed I can't see those faint scratches at all. Everything works perfectly and the battery condition is 100% which is amazing for a used phone. It may be two years old but for just one third the price of new this iPhone XS is a great deal.

column1: Overall happy but didn't match the discription
column2: Read this if your ear speaker is buzzingI doubt they are looking over these phones like they say they are. Got the XS and everything is working great but the ear speaker sounded blown out. When a speaker sounds like that usually it means you would need a replacement, but most of the time with the X and XS it's just lodged with dirt and needs to be cleaned out. (again the description says "thoroughly cleaned" and that they test and replace defective parts... doubt it.) I really didn't feel like going through a return process and since that was the only thing seemingly wrong I just loosened up the dirt with a soft brush and a q-tip and used scotch tape to grab up the loose dirt. My speaker now sounds normal and I didn't have to wait and risk getting another phone that had other issues.Other than that it works perfect. Battery was as described. Overall I'm happy with my purchase and would probably go through them again in the future. I'll update if there are any other issues.

The phone is amazing, Good performance, amazing screen, amazing camera, amazing battery life(I am coming from a 7plus with 65%health) this lasts the whole day unless I start gaming. It came with a screen protector but it was cheap so I replaced it with a jetech screen protector. While I was replacing it I noticed some minor scratches, some people say it’s bad, but with a screen protector you can’t tell.

I bought this for my Aunt's 75th birthday. From what she tells me, she was practically speechless. This unit had more features than was used to. She had an old iPhone 4S, and this was a serious upgrade for a decent price. I am an Android fan myself, but my Aunt has been using the IOS for many years and this is what she got. I highly recommend this cellphone to all who love Apple products. This one is top notch. Amazon rocks!

I purchased the Iphobe XS. It arrived sooner then the estimated delivery date.The packaging was sketchy, and under whelming. I was worried at first, but the phone is amazing. It’s in mint condition, no scratches, and works perfectly. The battery lasts all day. It’s a great phone. I highly recommend. I am completely satisfied with my purchase. 100% worth the money.

I had my new phone for 2 days now. So far no issues what so ever. My battery health is at 87% which isn’t too bad. I hoped I’d be lucky and get one with a higher health but 87 is still pretty good. The phone and no cosmetic flaws. It literally looked brand new. I am very happy with my purchase. But I am still going to be on the look out to see if any issues come up during the 90 day warranty. I bought my phone from the seller Trademore. The phone came in a box with their brand on it which I thought seemed professional and I also got a paper that told me my product is backed up by the 90 day warranty. My phone also came with a new Apple charger and an Apple charging cube. I am very impressed so far. I’ll update if any issues happen within my 90 day warranty!
Came with 100% battery health (battery was new), packaged well, and came early. After around 5 hours of use everything seems to be working well. Also came with a 90 day warranty.

This Iphone arrived a day early and in a nice box, worth every penny, i know you might be hesitant as it's a lot of moneybut it's so worth it. My iphone 6s stopped working so i went all in and bought this, the speed this works at is crazy fast. Glass front and back so get a good case. My phone arrived with 93% battery life and a very long cord with a plug and the cord seems to be wrapped in some metal which is so nice and makes it very sturdy. The face id works so well, in the dark, the side of my face, when i'm crying and when i have glasses on. The camera is AMAZING quality it takes really good picture. the selfie camera is so good and the flash doesnt give that weird black and white fuzzy thing my old phone did when i used flash in the dark. This phone is such good quality and worth it, also when you turn the phone on its side it plays the audio out of both top and bottom making it super easy to watch Netflix or DIsney+. thanks for reading! sincerely a very happy Amazon costumer.

My son's 6S Plus was getting too slow and losing battery power quickly. After reviewing screen sizes and comparing prices, this model is what we decided on for a replacement. We received it in like new condition, and it has been working like a champ for the past few months since we got it. Switching from the old phone to the new one was as simple as moving the SIM card.

The iPhone XS arrived, in nearly perfect condition...VERY minor marks on the back glass near the charging port, otherwise clean and unscathed.Most importantly, screen was perfect with no scratches or blemishes.iPhone booted cleanly, setup was normal, everything worked as expected.Battery health was rated at 98%, which is excellent for an 18 month old phone, especially a used/renewed/refurbished one.This battery has a bit of life left in it, and will act as an excellent stopgap before the iPhone 12 is released.

So good so far. I read several comments and it made me hesitant at first, but i still need an upgrade so it was kinda gambling for me. Mostly i see complaints about charger or product doesn't come with earphone. It's not a big problem for me since i already had those stuffs from the previous phone. The phone came with some tiny scratches on the side, top, and bottom. Again, not a big problem and really acceptable since the phone is unlocked and used. It doesn't come with a SIM-eject tool, but i have one. You can also put a paper clip in that hole. SIM tray needed a bit more pressure to open, perhaps this is only my problem. I'm satisfied so far.

Over the past few years I have purchased 4 phones from BuySPRY. All have been excellent phones. I have always been hesitant to buy used/refurbished electronics. After my experiences with this seller I always go straight to them for purchases. This was an iPhone XS I bought for my Granddaughter. She loves it. As with the other 3, it looks brand new. I am very happy with all the phones I have purchased for this seller and can recommend them.

column1: Great quality and worth the price
column2: The phone was ordered from the company “Hybrid IT”, specifically selected that one because of the amount of positive reviews they received. My phone came in great condition, 87% battery health which isn’t too bad for the price, no scratches on the screen or back panel.Delivery was very fast and effective, I got it two days earlier than Amazon predicted. I had no trouble installing my SIM card from a Russian cell provider, the device was indeed fully unlocked. The phone came in a simple box, with a charger and a cable of a generic type included.

I have received two devices. The first one had a bad sounding speaker and was replaced super fast with another phone.Externally both devices have only minuscule scratches, I had to look for them. The displays on both were immature. Battery life status on both 92%.The charger is a nice gimmick but the first Quick Charger doesn’t deserve the name. Doesn’t matter in the end to me but I’d recommend to buy an additional charger if this is your first iDevice.I didn’t choose the cheapest option but HybridIT because they had the best rating and they definitely deserve that. Great customer support

It's what I ordered. Enough said.The xs I received is in great condition. There's a few faint scratches on the screen but I have really be looking for them to find them. They aren't visable while using the phone normally so it's all good. The back glass and steel frame is nearly flawless. Also the 100% battery health shocked me. A very pleasant surprise. I upgraded from an iPhone 6s plus so overall I'm quite satisfied.

column1: Best Experience with a Renewed Phone
column2: I’ve had pretty bad luck with finding Renewed phones as my iPhone 6 battery died as soon as I got it in 2018 and my iPhone 7s battery went down significantly after a battery change. So I was looking for a worth while upgrade and found this phone and took a chance. It was the best chance I got. The only con is the battery life at 88% but that was to be expected since I bought it refurbished, and the screen only has very light scratches that you can’t see when the screens on. Otherwise, this is definitely a steal and worth the money. Don’t be scared of refurbished phones, only buy from the trusted sellers like Amazon. They’ll take care of you if anything goes wrong.

column1: Excellent buy of renewed iPhone XS 64GB Space Gray
column2: Just received my renewed iPhone XS and extremely happy with the purchase. It came packaged well and shipment was earlier than expected.The iPhone looks brand new and shiny with the exception of a minor scratch on the right end of the screen which is barely visible. Everything else looked like "In New" condition. Battery health was at 95%. I tested the functionality to make sure everything looked good and needless to say, I am very happy with this purchase.I am not so sure about all these negative reviews, either I was one of those extremely lucky people to get this product or some of these negative reviews are fake!Very happy with my purchase and highly recommend buying a renewed product from Amazon Sellers!! Great deal on the price too!!

This iPhone arrived in perfect conditions, it did not come in an original Apple box, but I did not mind that since the phone worked as good as new. No scratches, great battery life, it was impeccable. I am amazed by the low price. I fully recommend this product to anyone not willing to buy a brand-new iPhone XS.

The device arrived mostly charged. Logging in to the Apple account was simple and transitioning from the old iPhone to this new one was easy and fairly quick. The SIM card popped in to the new iPhone and no further configuration was necessary.The phone arrived with a screen protector was free of blemishes.5/5 - Would buy again :)

column1: Excellent price for GB you get. Battery 97%
column2: Very happy with this buy. True to GB and checked the battery life and was at 96 or 97% when received. Had a few scratches on screen but nothing major. Looks very nice. One of the best priced phones on Amazon right now especially for the GB. Happy with purchase. I did purchase the gold and silver was at 86% on battery life (purchase both)

Amazing phone- battery life is 100%, everything works perfect, and the outside of the phone looks brand new! So easy to switch from my iPhone 6s Plus to this iPhone XS by switching my SIM cards and logging in with my Apple ID. Thank you for such a great purchase- 2nd renewed by Amazon phone that I’ve purchased and both have been well worth it!!

column1: Great Company. BUT DI NOT BUY FROM BUYSPREE
column2: I bought this IPhone XS from Tech solutions. Stated as renewed but looked and operated as new.Absolutely no problems.They included a new charger and cable not an apple but works fine.Also no headphones (earbuds) and sent in a generic box.All as stated in posting.Again No problems from tech solutions out of New York.Again this company was great. However ......But DO NOT BUY FROM “Buyspree” from Maryland!!!I was sent a BLACKLISTED PHONE.Apple implied it was reported as stolen maybe “lost” but they implied stolen.T mobile could not and would not activate it.HOW COULD THEY SELL it as Renewed?They never touched it.After a bunch of emils and calls Amazon had my $ refunded.But buyspree took 8 days to refund.

column1: This iPhone seems to be brand new! Not a scratch or scuff on it!
column2: I was kinda shocked when I received this phone. I’ve never purchased a refurbished phone from Amazon before. I am too cheap to buy a new one from Apple or my carrier. What I got seems like a brand new phone! Not a scratch or scuff or anything on it! Battery is 95% which is better than expected for a phone this old.

You know that every device in this category is going to be individual, I’ll begin with the price it’s just high enough that you will expect a nice clean looking Device, that’s exactly what I got almost feels new generic boxing and mediocre packing materials take away from the Apple experience, who cares after 2 minutes with your nice clean new looking Apple iPhone XS loaded up with memory working like a dream , the device is fine t-mobile had no problem getting the device onto my account, all is well great purchase , Thanks To the Seller for putting such care into getting me a device that I hope will last a couple years

Arrived overnight, in less than 24 hours! Came with Apple approved charger and cord and even came with the little pin so I could pop out my SIM card.Very well packaged in bubble wrap, a box and wrapped in two envelopes.Phone itself is in very nice consisting and works like a charm. Thanks very much for this phone!

column1: Great quality phone and support from seller
column2: Buying this product was of great risk to me than most as I am from the Caribbean and return wasn’t an option for me. That being said, upon receiving product it was in great condition and actually exceeded my expectations. The phone works great and while initially I couldn’t hear properly on the earpiece with the support of mobile supply I was able to troubleshoot and realized the solution was to simply clean it with a soft fine brush and now all is well. The battery life came in at 88 percent as well and I think this was also an upside. I have and will recommend this product to others.

My refurbished iPhone XS looked like new out of the box. There were no visible blemishes, and everything has worked quickly and properly since setup. I appreciated the prompt shipping, especially during the busy holiday season. I hope not to need another phone for quite some time, but I would certainly get another one from this seller when I'm in the market again.

The phone came extremely fast and had no visible issues. The battery life was at 100% and I’ve had no issues connecting it to my carrier. I was looking for a phone with great quality and this definitely exceed my expectations. The screen it’s self is also very clear and bright compared to my old phone.

Looks like I bought it from AppleThere is not one flaw.Battery is 91% healthI surely found the right store!Charging brick, cable.. all new.It arrived in two days, five days early!Woohoo. Talk about satisfied!I never bought renewed before, and I’m sure glad I did !Thank you!Thank you! Thank you! Thank you!

column1: Easy to use with touch screen gestures
column2: The touch screen gestures are easy to use, no need for home button.Great on connections 4g lte and bluetooth.The loud speaker is awesome great for hands free listening to GPS directions, Phone calls and Music.Loud speaker not so good for playing golf clash as it won'tplay gc sounds automatically,only once in a while If I connect bt headphones then disconnect while playing the loud speaker comes on.So for gc game only I use bt speaker or headphones.This is a compatibility issue as my nephew had the same phone and problem. Not a game breaker for me,Luv this phone.Wish apple would come out with an update with a fix.Update a month after this review apple put a fix in software update no problems with loud speaker with golf clash.aesome phone highly recommend

column1: Great find and buy! Totally worth the money!
column2: It’s been a few days since I’ve had my phone and it’s been working great! It took about a week to get here, since the weather was kinda hectic, but that’s the only downside of my experience. Tech Ventures did an awesome job at refurbishing this phone, feels like I got it brand new! The screen quality is amazing, the battery lasts for the whole day despite me playing COD-Mobile, being on my social media apps and YouTube. It’s a really great phone and I am in love. I upgraded from my iPhone 7 Plus since it was starting to mess up on me, sadly, but I’ve been wanting this phone since it came out in 2018 and I finally have it!

The phone was EXACTLY as described!It looks like a new phone that would cost a WHOLELOT MORE FOR. For someone who doesn’t “live” on their phone, this was a great deal. I’ll look here next time I’m wanting/needing a phone.

This is a really great phone you should get it but the only down side is that it has a bit of scratches on the screen but it looks like this phone has Been in the case for its whole life no scratches or anything on the back I love this phone I really recommend it!!!!

I was nervous, because I read really bad reviews (as well as really good ones). But I was pleasently surprised when the phone arrived. It works AWESOME! The camera, life battery, face recogntion, everything!! The only thing are some scratches on the back, that are bearly noticeable. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS BUYER, and will keep posting updates if something happens!

Wonderfully surprised at how new it looks and runs. The battery life is almost 100% and touch is incredibly fast. Thinking of purchasing another one for my daughter, but I will only purchase it from same place. It completely exceeded my expectations.

I was also hesitant about purchasing a refurbished iPhone but as soon as it was delivered I haven’t been off it ever since, no issues at all it comes with a charger and in a simple little box. No scratches at all no dents nothing at all and plus my battery health is at 87% I have no complaints at all I transferred everything from my other iPhone and put in my old SIM card and had to nothing else. I would definitely trust this seller they even gave me there information just in case I had any issues. A+ service

I was skeptical about buying this phone I was concerned and worried about how it would arrive. I didn’t know if it would be a waist of money and a great product. This is for sure a great phone I been using it for a little bit and I like it it works with the carrier I had no scratches no cracks camera works good Face ID works good it came well packaged that will protect the phone and I’m still worried how it’ll do in like a week but hopefully it makes up for the long time it took to ship but it made up for it. The battery life is at 82% not what I like but it’s great for a used phone and hopefully this doesn’t mess up anything with my carrier but it works great makes phones I can send text so I’ll see how it does sorry I can’t add photos because I writing this review on the iPhone XS I just baught

I was very nervous about buying a renewed product this expensive, but I've had the phone for a month or two and love it. Works great, no problems and in great condition. As far as value for the money, Apple will never rate high in that category for me. lol

works perfectly!
it's spotless, works great. the only issue is the battery came at 83%, but I guess that might mean it still has an original battery, which might be better than a chinesium onethe cable and included charger are no good though, they make false contactEDIT: the cable works just fine, it was just that the socket was plugged with pocket cotton, so i'm a bit more certain that this phone came as is, without any refurbishments, which is great because it looks brand new.

Overall great phone. After reading reviews from multiple places I was honestly skeptical but this place has met and exceeded expectations. The phone overall is in great condition. I’ve been unit about a month now before writing the review but I honestly have no real complaints. Highly recommend and I definitely will buy another phone from here again. Thank you.

column1: This renewed IPhone XS looks brand new with NO scratches
column2: Last time I bought a renewed iPhone from Amazon the screen went in 2 days so I was worried about buying another one but my daughters iPhone 11 screen went so I ordered iPhone XS and she loves it it’s a good size screen and takes great pictures, this phone looks brand new, no scratches at all, love it!!

New to Iphones, previous galaxy guy.Whole family was on Iphones but me.The voice recognition ability of Siri is truly amazing compared to whateverSamsung is using (Bixby?).I hate typing texts, and like to speak them, and some of my previous ones on the old phone were either hilarious or embarrassing or both.I think Siri learns heuristically because I rarely have to proof read what I speak now.Being able to just say, "Hey Siri, call whoever" and have it happen is a big time-saver not having to look up the numbers.It's like having an assistant in the phone, but not having to fool with setting it up.You just speak to it.The phone itself appears new, not a scratch on it.Battery life is at 86%, but I haven't been able to use it up in a day, so that works for me.Learning how to navigate the phone is challenging, as many things sort of work like a Galaxy, but it can be frustrating.But overall, I glad I made the switch.

Got this from HybridIT and this phone is in excellent condition for a refurbished phone, faint light scratches on screen but very good , all aspects of the phone work, battery life is 86% health which is not bad at all for the age of the phone, very clean overall, and no issues with my T-Mobile carrier. Excellent refurbished phone, highly recommend getting a phone from this seller.

I was definitely debating about purchasing a refurbished phone because of the possible dents or scratches it could have. However, today I received my first refurbished phone in the mail it took 4 days for it to arrive and it came in an original iphone box with non original charger. The iphone itself was in new condition with not a single scratch or dent on the phone. Once setting it up I checked the iphone battery and its at 100% and the screen resolution looks good as well. So far I am completely satisfied with my device and the company's packaging. Company is O&M wireless. Hope this helps anyone debating with a refurbished phone shopping

column1: Exactly what it say it is
column2: My son is very happy with his new phone. We simply popped in the existing T-Mobile SIM and created an iTunes account. He was up and running in no time. I’m sure it’s even easier if you’re transferring from another iPhone. Phone looked brand new and has worked glitch free from the start.

GET IT GET IT GET IT. Such a good price. I got it for my 13 y/o daughter bc I didn’t want to spend thousands of dollars on a new phone. But a renewed phone is just right for her. She loves it. And no problems

column1: Nervous at first, but Worth it!
column2: I was nervous about buying a refurbished phone, but since there is an Amazon backed warrantee it made me feel better so I went for it! I’m so glad I did! I got the phone I wanted and saved big money vs buying it brand new. It works beautifully, a huge upgrade from my old phone. I wish they would let us know what was refurbished on the phone, but it works perfectly. No complaints. It does come in an unmarked box but arrived on time and the charger it came with works well.

Received the phone. It was in perfect condition. I had an Issue with what I thought was the phone, turned out to be my carrier. I contacted the company, they were very understanding, and assured me that I would have no trouble if I had to return it. They gave me the time I needed to resolve the issue. I’m very happy with my new phone

I was debating between buying an iPhone from this seller or buying it directly from Apple - so glad I gave this a chance! I saved so much, and the phone was delivered super quickly and looks and works like new! The battery health is at 96% and I like that it also comes with a cable and charging block. Definitely an amazing deal if you don’t mind not getting the original box!

I was looking to buy locally but prices were high so I decided to look at Amazon for used iphone XS. I was a little nervous seeing that there were some different experiences and the minimum battery health of 80% guaranteed by the Amazon Renewed guarantee wasn't as good as I'd want, but I decided to go for it, since there was a 90 day return period (can't get that buying local!). Boy was I pleasantly surprised. This phone looked like it was brand new. I can't find a scratch anywhere, front or back! And the battery health was 94%. Everything works as it should and have not had even one iota of an issue after having it for a month now. I feel like I pulled one over on someone to have this work out so well!

The renewed iPhone XS came in near perfect condition.Face ID works and the max capacity of the battery is at 88%.I was hesitant due to the bad reviews, but the gamble worked out (this time).The supplier I bought it from was MOBILESUPPLY

column1: 3rd order is the charm for this renewed iphone XS!
column2: Yes, I had to order a 3rd to get one that worked!! First one, you could not hear people talking when held to your ear. So ordered a second one; second one was a Japanese phone that was unlocked but not capable with US Verizon network. So ordered a 3rd!! 3rd phone works great. Buyer beware, you can get a good deal but you may have issues with renewed phones. We went through the same thing with a renewed iPhone 11Pro; in that instance, 2nd time was the charm.

column1: I had doubts, but ended very pleased (spanish review)
column2: Lo compre como regalo para mi esposa, con muchas dudas por los reviews que había leído en la pagina, para mi sorpresa llego en muy buen estado, la batería con bastante vida y hasta ahora esta funcionando perfectamente, muy bien conservado y por el precio es una muy buena compra.

I don’t know what other buyers are complaining about- my phone arrived in perfect like new condition! Charged it, took the new SIM card out of my old phone and put it in the new one, and we were good to go!

I bought from seller ReFoned - phone came so clean, no dirt in speaker/mic holes, oddly new. Screen has some very minor signs of wear. No water damage, looks basically knew. Battery health at 99%… so I checked the serial on apple.com, say it still have warranty too!?? This is basically a brand new phone for a pre-owned price. Will buy from this seller again.

Product came quickly (ahead of initial projection), looked brand new including new headphones and power jack, plastic coverings on machine as you’d see in brand new packaging.Exterior stickers on box were a little dirty but not to be unexpected.Setup was flawless; package included key to eject/swap SIM card.

I was really scared to make this purchase as it is my first time buying a refurbished phone and also because it was the cheapest out of all the options but I took the chance and I was not disappointed.The phone came with no scratches or dents. It looks brand new. The battery life was 86% which isn't bad at all and it came with a fast charger and block.Would definitely buy from this seller again.

I was extremely iffy on this phone because its renewed but it was a great price so i figured why not ? The phone just came in today and it was so easy to transfer everything i had backed up on my last phone. The phone looks brand new and has no scratches and you cant even tell it had ever been used before. I 100% recommend over buying it brand new.

This is the best phone, perfectly sized, has a decent weight which makes it more balanced feeling( for me anyway, some may not agree) but it’s as durable as it says, my previous iPhone XS took a small swim in my cats water bowl while I was asleep….. Close to 7 or more hours….While PLUGGED IN! Once it dried it worked fine.Definitely recommend, I rarely write reviews, this is a great value.

column1: A very good deal! Absolutely no regrets!
column2: I received my phone yesterday. For the price I have no regrets. I made a very god deal. No scratches even a little little. Very responsive screen. Face id is very well. My only bad note is for the battery only 86 of health. But for the price I couldn’t expect better. Phone comes with a charger an power sector. I am really happy for my new phone.
I've had the XS for three weeks and it's been great! It arrived in excellent condition. The battery life has been good. Runs much faster than the Iphone 8 I had. Happy so far!

Battery health was 95% out of the box. However, the screen has been replaced with a cheaper LED and not an OLED. The LED is a bit thicker and sticks up above the bezel. I bought a case that hides it well enough so it really isn’t a big issue. Still annoying though. Other than that I have no complaints.
You'd never know this was refurbished....it looks brand new.Not one single scratch anywhere and the battery charged to 100%!I couldn't be happier with this purchase.Highly recommend!

I had to return the first one. It gave me battery issues within a week of getting it. However the return process was incredibly simple and they sent me a replacement one. After I received the replacement one, I sent back the old one.The replacement has been terrific.

I’ve had this phone for two days. It has zero scratches and in perfect shape. It changed over fine, and today I went and got no contract service from spectrum.. with whine I have internet with. Fair price and the phone did great. The battery life is not great, but no fault of the seller. I would recommend

Well packed and arrived promptly. Look like a new phone. Usual glitches transferring data from old phone not caused by new one. Carefully ready Apple’s instructions online beforehand. I have no complaints about this whole experience.
My grandchild is too smart for his own good and ordered an iphone just because he wants one.The seller made the return easy and relatively painless.I still had to beef up my Amazon login security.

I never write reviews, but this one deserves one because I can understand the skepticism on buying a phone online. I was really worried mine would arrive cracked or wouldn't arrive at all BUT everything works perfectly fine. I bought over two months ago and wanted to wait to see how it worked before writing a review. I'll definitely be buying one soon for my mother as her Christmas gift!As for the negative reviews, maybe Amazon's delivery is the one responsible for cracked screens, etc. The provider seems responsible and trust worthy!

column1: I would have never guessed this phone was refurbished. Came as new.
column2: Had to buy a new phone when I didn't want to and wasn't expecting to. Deliberated over options for a few days and decided on this one. Zero complaints. Phone works and looks as new. Even came with a thirty dollar phone case (free of charge) and screen protectors.

I received my phone in just a few days, and the condition was excellent.Not a scratch on the screen OR the body of the phone. Battery capacity shows as 94% which is excellent.I would absolutely buy another refurb phone from this seller in a heartbeat.This phone was 1/3 the price of new.

column1: Great phone at a fantastic price!
column2: I like the ease of signing in with face recognition, it couldn’t be easier!Am not wild about the shut down sequence required, maybe there’s an easier way to accomplish that I haven’t found yet? Other than that I couldn’t be happier with my new phone!

Don’t use face recognition but sure it probably works fine. I was most impressed with the battery life. Easily get a day out of it. Only thing I notice is when talking the connection gets garbled and sounds robotic. I don’t believe that is the phone however as the only times that happened have been when I was speaking to someone either on an iPhone 6 or an iPhone 5s. Also they were moving so it could be a reception issue. Giving it 5 stars cause I can’t prove there are any issues whatsoever with the phone and the price is unbeatable.

column1: amazing for the price i purchased it for
column2: this product is really really great. im very happy with the quality and everything about it. the only slight problem i had was not with the phone but the packaging because the phone didn't fit in the little plastic container and it fell out when i opened it. it had a short deep scratch which is fine because the phone is refurbished and the batteries capacity was 92%.i highly recommend purchasing from this seller

I was super worried about buying a phone offline. However, this one not only came in 5 days earlier than expected it looked amazing! There was only one small knick on the top right corner of the phone itself and that’s it. I had to look hard to find it too. The phone works great, looks great, and I definitely recommend getting this one for the price as well!!

This iPhone didn’t have a blemish. Acts like a brand new phone. Battery health 86%. Lasts me all day but I don’t stream data continuously. The charger was from China and the enclosed cord is not original but all seem to work properly

Before ordering this phone I searched everywhere, and never thought I would order on Amazon. When I ordered the phone I was scared and thought it would be a bad phone, but I took my chances and when it came I slowly opened everything it had no scratches on it literally no scuffs, marks, nothing at all its brand new, the battery life is at 100% its GSM unlocked everything is good. People might complain about the phone not being in original box or have original charger but who cares the phone was great. And if you someone like me that’s been stressing from the reviews and deciding, just take your chances you can always return it.

This is an amazing buy for the price (330) when I purchased. The screen is pretty scratched up with small scratches but they are hidden which a screen protector. Everything works perfectly. My battery came with 86% capacity. The phone is basically a steal if you get it at a good price
I was a little hesitant about buying this phone off Amazon ,reconditioned too. I definitely have to say that I am very happy and the phone is perfect!I would definitely recommend too others.Thank you

I saw some reviews that were questionable. However, when we got this phone there was not a scratch on it, battery life was great, and it was reset to factory settings. My husband switch his SIM card and was ready to go. Backed it up to his ICloud and everything from old phone was fully restored all the way down to the screensaver he had. He is pleased with his new phone.

With all the negative reviews here and there, I was a bit hesitant to purchase but due to my need I decided to anyway. It arrived perfect, Like new even. No scratches, no scuffs, no dents and no issues. Im really happy with this purchase. The price was unmatched.

So far I am very satisfied with my order. The condition was as described. There are no noticeable scratches or scuffs on the front or back on the phone. It came in an Amazon box (see picture) with a compatible plug/cable. It was very easy to transfer the data from my old iPhone X -- apps, pictures... everything. The front and back camera work and look sharp. I haven't noticed any issues with the battery. Everything seems to be working well! I just popped in my SIM and its good to go.

column1: Looks and works like Brand New!!!
column2: Love my new iPhone 10s.It looks and works like it's a brand new phone right out of the box.The seller claims a battery heath percent of 80%, mine was 92%.The seller claims "acceptable", screen condition (scratches). Mine was perfect! Not a scratch!And love the new face recognition feature with the 10s.Couldn't be happier!!!

I was able to do all of the setup and data transfer by myself.However, it took a TMobile rep to activate it.Once contacted, however, all was well and the phone does work with my existing TMobile account.

I hesitated to buy a renewed phone, but knowing Amazon stands behind it made me click Yes. I’m glad I did. This replaces my awesome iPhone 6s Plus which now seems clunky and heavy by comparison.Works great on my Straight Talk service; photos are richer and the display is gorgeous. The seller is on time and provides a warranty. Saved over $200 by not buying from Apple.

I bought this refurbished iPhone XS from BuySPRY and I am totally amazed at the quality of the phone.It virtually looks like it rolled of the Apple assembly line.BuySPRY accurately described the product.In the box were instructions, the SIM tool and charge cord.Kudos to BuySPRY and thank you for being an honest Amazon seller.

Third refurbished phone I have purchased over last few years and all were great. Cosmetically like new, battery life is excellent and all and all cannot complain. Set it up quickly and it is 3x faster vs my wife's previous IPhone. Why pay retail is my question.

I was worried that I was going to get an iPhone with scratches. Not the case at all. The phone looks like new. If I had to complain about something would be the battery capacity, that is 87% maximum capacity, but I really don’t think that’s a problem or a deal breaker. Good experience, good purchase, happy customer!

column1: Great phone. My 15 yr old loves it
column2: I bought it from WOOT, like it so much I bought a second one. Price was right and works perfectly. Even after 4 months, phone is perfectly.

It’s great! No problem with it that I can see, I was so worried but everything’s fine. I guess it was a hit or miss but I got a good company that sent it out so I’m super duper happy about that!! Writing this on my new turned on phone as we speak, unlocked gold 64g worked for metro to switch my plan which was my biggest concern for this!! Thank you!!

delivered a month ago.I bought this to replace iPhone 6 with no more battery life.Delivery was very quick.There is only one tiny blemish that I can find.This phone is in excellent shape and I am glad I purchased from Hybrid IT.

I ordered one of these for my wife, and right out of the box something seemed off. It became increasingly apparent that it was a knock-off iPhone and we could never get it fully set up. After returning it and requesting a new phone (which took a little longer than expected) we were able to successfully set up and transfer her data to the second phone. The new phone works perfectly and we haven't had any problems with it.

I was very pleasantly surprised when I received this phone! There were zero scratches or dings, and I was able to transfer my SIM card from my old Android phone to this iPhone with no problems. I really like the phone screen size, fits in your pocket and isn’t huge like most other phones. I’m quite pleased with how everything turned out for the price! I was a bit anxious buying an unlocked phone online, but there was no need to worry. If you’re unsure about buying this phone, I will tell you I think it’s a good idea!

I was nervous about buying a refurbish phone but it was worth it camera works well, the speaker is amazing, i didnt see any scratches,the battery life seems ok .The issue i saw was , there were little dust in the speaker grill but the phone works perfect

I am VERY happy with the service and product I received. This XS is literally brand new in all aspects considering the fact it's a 2019 model. Battery health is at 100% capacity! I couldn't ask for a better phone.

Phone came with 96% battery health. Phone does have some small scratches on the aluminum siding, and some scuffs on the screen. ALTHOUGH, there is no visible scratches when the screen is lit up, which is my concern. Everything works perfectly. I am extremely happy with this purchase. If you are worried that you are receiving a phone in bad quality, rest assured that the phone will arrive in almost perfect condition. I will never buy a brand new iPhone in my life again. Thank you seller for taking the time to make sure this iPhone was in almost perfect brand new condition. Any small scuffs are not noticeable and should be expected when buying a refurbished phone. The screen is perfect, the battery health is perfect, and the phone arrived a week ahead of time. I am extremely happy.

column1: Everything as promised at a great price
column2: Ireceivedmy phone when promised in perfect condition with all the accessories that come with the refurbishedphone very happy with this phone my only issue is the battery is only80% but so far it lasts longer than the iPhone7with a new battery that I an replacing

column1: Looks & Works Like A New Phone
column2: Received this a month & half ago. It is an amazing phone!! It came in perfect condition, no scratches or cracks...looked brand new. The phone works exceptionally. I am glad I decided to buy from Amazon as I have bought refurbished phones elsewhere & they were complete junk. Would buy from Amazon again!!

Phone was in excellent condition, basically flawless. One minor scuff along the top edge and battery at 85% were the only main issues. Still can’t complain, a case and battery replacement and I’m good as new!
Except for the battery life, usage, the phone is great and even though the battery life is shorter than what I would like, I wouldn't trade it in.

column1: Great condition. Battery life is 100%. Very surprised this little machine still runs great in 2022
column2: It was in great condition. Battery life was 100% and in 2022 runs great. Bought it to test games I am developing and fell in love with the phone and how it just fits my hand.
