I got this as a work phone and I couldn't be happier. It was a great price and it works perfectly. I think maybe the screen was replaced but for what I need this is absolutely perfect.
Works like it should they also included a screen protector with it! Heck of a lot cheaper than a new phone! I want to stay with the 10s because it’s 4g still

Wow I am pleasantly surprised at how much I love this phone! Everything works like brand new! They even included a free screen protector! iPhones typically overheat easily do I expected that from this. Getting a Razer phone case to eliminate the heating issue. Thank you! So far no problems

Fully unlocked and take great pics! Also no scratches, came with screen protector and very clean quality. The charger was lame, so I bought a fast charger instead. No other accessories came but I never liked AirPods so it less things to throw away for me.happy with my purchase!

Mine came with 93% battery life and in almost new condition which I am using to type this review with! Can’t go wrong including the 90 day and amazon seller guid lines. No need to spend $1500 on the 11pro
UPDATE** It is 2022 and I am still typing on my iPhone, still works like a champ. Keeping it until the unfortunate happens. Good seller good products.

column1: Worth the money and a trust-worthy renewed phone!
column2: I have used the iPhone XS for two days. The shipping was very quick and arrived 2 days before expected. The phone had a few scratches on the screen, but could only be seen with the screen off and when the phone was angled in a specific way (so minimal I couldn’t get a good picture of it for this review). The battery health was 85%, which was within the range Amazon said it would be in, but still fairly low. The price is so worth it. The phone works great and is still high quality and modern looking and feeling, especially for such a great price. I was so hesitant but the packaging was good, the phone quality is good, and so far I am very happy!

The phone works great and doesn’t have a scratch on it. Very pleased with product so far and the price is fair. Shipping a little slower than usual, but the quality was worth the wait. Great product if you want to save some money.

Even though it’s renewed, it looks brand new. I was able to update it to iOS 14.3 with no problems, and all the features work as expected. Delivery was also really fast, so can’t complain.
This is still a good phone to own, as it feels fast, and with the latest updates you can get by.

This is my new favorite iPhone model. Runs way faster than my old 6S and outperforms my cracked XR in every way imaginable. There is only a barely-visible scuff at the top outer edge of the phone which I’m too lazy to take out the case and show but it’s unimportant nonetheless so don’t worry about it. So far, so good. Has 81% battery life. Very decent for the price, thanks Amazon. Yeehee!

column1: If you are a se opt citizen, have your grandchildren or someone closer to their age to help you!
column2: So far so good. It involves a lot more functions than my previous phone. I guess that’s because I was used to it. I’m old school. So I wish an easy to understand booklet came with it on how to use different functions. Also, I have to charge it more often.

I never bought anything over the internet as expensive before so I was very surprised to find my order delivered within three days. I honestly thought it was a scam for how short of a delivery time it took to get here, but it was the real deal. No damage to phone small scratches on the sides nothing noticeable unless really investigated. My mom put her SIM card in and it worked right away. Complete new used phone unlocked no problems working. Her face recognition works better then my sisters iPhone 11. Phone lasts through the day without a chargeunless she streams movies on her phone.
Tenía miedo al principio. Pero me lleve una grata sorpresa. Parece un equipo nuevo en todos sus aspectos
Great price for the pre owned iphone. No blemishes, perfect audio and screen. Amazing battery life. Came with a screen protector. I will buy pre owned iphones from Amazon again.

look being honest it is an amazing phone its bot brand new but if you read the description it's exactly everything you pay for you don't always get a apple charger and i didn't but this is a good buyer i got my phone and it was in a basic amazon box which was expected and the phone was flawless it cane with a cheap charger but thats fine it actually says all this in the description but if you read it before you buy it then you wont get your hopes up expecting an apple box and stickers and everything now ill admit some probably do have scratches but these are renewed they arent brand new. otherwise id definitely recommend!
The phone arrived on time and in good condition. There were not obvious scratches at all. It was unlocked and my carrier switched it over. So far so good.

column1: The iphone was in excellent conditions
column2: It was my first adquisition of a phone from internet. I was very worried of this transaction because I'm in South America right now, but the iphone was in perfect conditions, no scratches in any part of the phone, the battery life came in 83%, what is very good for what the phone is.I really recommend if you want to buy an iphone for a very low price.P.d: I buyed the unlocked one and works perfectly here in Paraguay
Everything was as like new on this renewed XS. I bought this for a service member that was in a jam. Although I did not put my hands on it, I was told that it was better than expected. Hooyah!

Of course, I was skeptical buying a preowned device that I could not physically see. However, I was pleasantly surprised when a near flawless Iphone arrived at my door. The screen and back glass are free from any scratches, they're literally in perfect condition. The stainless steel edges were a little bit roughed up however after wiping them down with a cloth they look good as new as well! My battery health was at 90% health too! Overall it was a good buy , and I am very happy with the amount of money I saved. ! !
Phone is brand new! 96% battery life! It doesn’t have a single scratch! Face ID working properly! 100% recommended!

Estaba un poco dudosa de comprar un artículo renewed, ya hace una semana que ando el iPhone XS de 256gb y no tengo queja, me llego en tiempo, intacto sin ningún defecto, garantía apple por 6 meses y con 98% de battery life. Altamente recomendado.

column1: Good seller , fast and on time
column2: I order this phone for my mom , her old iphone 6 is dying , Wow she love this iphone XS , Because is smaller and gold color,higher quality better camera , I Highly Recommend .

Phone arrived in good time and in lovely condition! I immediately got a case and screen protector (learned my lesson from the last phone...) and got it set up. Everything worked really well and seemlessly. The battery is only about 90% capacity but it works just fine for me. Quality is great, no noticeable scratches or anything. I use Total Wireless and had no connection issues at all.
Bought for my husband. He's been wanting an IPhone, he uses one at work. The battery is only 75-80% useful. Overall he was happy, and I loved the bargain price.

Works great. Checked the battery life and storage as soon as I got it. 256gb and 81% battery. I’m pretty sure it has an after market screen on it because it glitches every once in a while but it may just be the app. Would definitely recommend

I received it a week ago and it didn’t came with a screen protector as they advertised. Battery life is at 83%, i was expecting a bit more based on other reviews, but i guess it’s fine. But everything else works good, oh wait, at first i thought that the screen was a bit yellowish in comparison with my previous iPhone but i guess I’ve already accustomed to that. Will be editing if anything happens**

i bought this for my little sister because her 6+ was finally giving out on her and this is SO pretty! i wouldn’t believe it was refurbished honestly and it turned on beautifully and transferred all data in less than 20 mins and not to mention it came a few days early!! would recommend 10/10!!

column1: Great phone and no scratches it looks almost new
column2: I am very happy with my purchase. It is prefect as if new, I don’t see a scratch. To my surprised it came with a screen protector already installed. It is unlocked !! my carrier is at&t and it works perfectly. I also plan on using it when I travel to my home country in Central America.
The ability to outright purchase a phone from a reputable seller is important to me. The phone was exactly as described and arrived quickly!
I’m glad I found this iPhone X, it’s beautiful everything works well (so far)& loved the price even more!

I have to say, I was concerned about the quality of this phone but this company did an incredible job. The phone came in great condition with no visible scratches or dents. The phone functions great and I’m very impressed with the attention to detail with the packaging, instructional assistance and the quality of customer service.

column1: Not a single scratch, AND A SCREEN PROTECTOR CAME WITH IT!
column2: I have to say I was nervous to buy cuz I had seen some bad reviews, but my expectations were BEYOND met!! Not only is there not a single mark on it, it had a TEMPERED GLASS SCREEN PROTECTOR ON IT ALREADY!!! I’m incredibly happy about my new phone and I encourage anyone to buy !!! Thank you again!
The phone is fast and functional and the smaller profile of the xs suits my needs better.I was surprised how inexpensive it was to up-grade from 64 GB to 256 ... well worth the money in my view.
Great used product - I am very satisfied with the quality and performance for the price.Highly recommend.

This renewed phone was a good price and arrived on time looking and working like brand new. The only problem I have had is getting used to a phone that is 5 years newer than my previous iPhone 5. Love the bigger but not ginormous screen.
The first phone I ordered did not work and was returned. I thought about it and tried another phone.The iPhone XS. This phone has worked better then I could have hoped for. Thank you I love it

Replacement for my daughter's iPhone 7+ that just wasn't working any more. We really couldn't afford a new phone. So far so good. She is very happy with her "new to her" phone. I was very hesitant, but if the first few days are any indication, the iPhone xs we purchased appears to be in excellent condition and working on our carrier.

Works perfectly. Came at 89% battery capacity. Everything works and it all looks immaculate. Came with a clear screen cover, SIM card pin, wall wart and cord. Came 5 days earlier than anticipated!! I was concerned after reading some reviews, but I have no problems or complaints! Very pleased!
Phone looks like new condition. No box included and aftermarket accessories. Phones works perfectly.

Purchased this for my daughter who just turned 16.I got an amazing deal for the 512 GB.She is completely happy.Arrived charged, no visible scratches or issues with the phone and it works great.I was nervous buying a refurb but am happy I took the chance now!

column1: Good value if you don’t mind used
column2: I didn’t have any issues. The charger they send kinda sucks so just go ahead and buy one. No scratches. 93% battery life.

I was a litt hesitant to get a refurbished / "renewed" phone, but I'm happy I did! The phone I received looks perfectly new - no scratches or dents, everything works how it's supposed to. It came it a Verizon certified box , with a charger and tool to use for sim card tray. Highly recommended!

I ordered the 256GB Fully Unlocked iPhone XS in silver. It came in near perfect condition (just one scratch on the front). It was delivered with a screen protector. It came with a battery health of 94%. Incredible value for one of the best iPhones on the market!

column1: Phone Looks New and Holding 100% Charge
column2: I love the phone.Phone looks brand new, no scratches or dents anywhere.Charges all the way to 100%.Definitely will be a second one.Recommend it highly.
Original phone locked up. Sent it back and received a replacement right away. Helpful, friendly seller and staff. Replacement phone worked great!
the seller add a cable charger and sim card key, but the speaker doesn’t work well , full volume and till can’t hear anything, I don’t wanna deal with returning, so I use with headphones

I’m very pleased with this iPhone! Face recognition is great and I charge at night and phone battery lasts all day and I use and depend on my phone a lot. The screen quality is excellent and the camera is wonderful.

This was the first time I ever got a phone that I didn’t buy in person and I was not disappointed. Everything worked fine, the phone was in perfect condition, I even traded the same phone in for an upgrade this year!

column1: Like new, for the most part
column2: Bought mine from the seller Trademore. Came in generic box with new cable and charge plug. Phone looked and feels pristine. Everything about it is great aside from the battery life, settings shows health is at 86% my old 6s plus with replaced battery is at 95% so don't know if I will keep it.
Item arrived with cracked screen, no refund issue still.

I purchased my iPhone back in March. Here we are Jan 2022 and it still works. No scratches or nothing still and I done dropped it more than once lol. This is a really great phone and it’s my first ever iPhone so yeah. The charger that comes with the phone..omg I love this charger. It charges my phone up to 100% in 60 mins. 30 mins it’s already on 50% so yeah. Definitely money we’ll spent. Thanks
I have used Hybrid IT several times and have never disappointed. Very quick delivery! +++++
Just like everyone else I was afraid to order a phone online but thank God this one is great, came in mint condition, everything works battery health is at 95%, which lasts all day.

Was skeptical about purchasing seller refurbished phone.Received a quality looking product, packaged decently.There are a copy small scratches on the screen, but that's expected for a used phone.The battery life is 100% and so far, the phone has worked flawlessly.The XS is a huge upgrade from a 7.

column1: Basically Perfect and Brand New (ignore the angry 1 star)
column2: I was a little bit scared of my purchase given the one star review, but I was extremely pleasant Lee surprised. The phone I received looks completely brand new (I looked for any defects and I couldn’t find one), the battery health is 100, and the screen is great. I would highly recommend buying this if you’re interested.

column1: Perfect condition.  Looks and works just like new with free IOS upgrades
column2: Have had it only 3 days in 2021 and works perfectly.Easy to register with Apple.No problems.Came with 89 percent battery left.Not bad for a 2+ year old phone.
Everything went well. Phone was in perfect condition

column1: Perfect condition iPhone XS from Tech Exchange
column2: I just got my iPhone XS from Tech Exchange.It is in a perfect condition.I will buy again from Tech Exchange in future Renew phone.

I was worried about buying an iPhone from anywhere other than apple but this is real!! I saw some reviews about cosmetic damage but mine has none. It even came with a screen protector. I have a tiny, local phone company out of small town in Texas and was worried it would not be compatible but it works perfectly! This is how I will continue to purchase my phones. The charger that came with it didn’t work very long but that is not a big deal to me.

Phone came in perfect condition with no scratches. Looks like new! Battery life is 88%. My daughter has been using it for about a month now and is happy with it! I was worried about buying refurbished, but this was a great deal!

So far so good. I received the phone on the 23rd. I will update the review if anything changes. The phone arrived like new but in great condition. The battery life is at 83%. Not bad in my opinion. I’m happy with my purchase.

The phone is great, looks new acts new. I don't use facial recognition, but it was not hard to set it up. The battery life is not there greatest, but it lasts long enough and it charges fast. The picture is great, I love it and the sound quality. Not to mention the awesome camera. I'm very happy

Phone is basically brand new with only some delicate scratches on the front screen that aren't that noticable. The phone is fully functional. Works great and has the GB I needed. Cameras are perfect. Battery life could be the tiniest bit better but is perfectly fine otherwise. I was worried about buying an iPhone from Amazon and from a seller that wasn't Apple in general but I am overall happy with my purchase and am glad I took the risk because I now have a better phone and didn't spend a fortune on it.

column1: Very satisfied purchase, excellent condition and operation
column2: Super glad I bought this used phone on Amazon. Saved good bucks and was able use gift card balances to buy it! Feel safe buying a used phone in this manner from Amazon. Will likely do it again when next needing a phone.

column1: OLED makes this iphone worth keeping.
column2: OLED display. Glass backside makes cleaning a breeze. Add a $2 clear TPU to protect drop damages.I came from a iphone 5s to XS. I know mini size phones are not popular, but the 5s is light and get it gets the job done, but it is outdated.
I'm very pleased with this refurbished phone. Battery health was at 100%.
I was impressed with this phone. It came in optimal condition. Nicely packaged with a charger. So far it seems to work just fine. The phone loons brand new

This item came in a few days. I was a bit sceptical when purchasing a refurbished phone however, this one came in perfect condition, not scratches or problems whatsoever. It came with a charger not the original apple charger but one that works really well nonetheless. Its been a few months and the phone is still working perfectly. All main features are operational. I have absolutely nothing negative to say about this product.

column1: Wish it had touch id instead of face ID.
column2: Face id is useless when wearing a mask half of the time.Phone is great. 256GB of memory is great.No problems yet.They did a great job at refurbishing the phone.

I did my research and stumbled upon Hybrid IT reviews, and they delivered. Phone was in great condition and seemed to only have phone case wear. The battery capacity was about 85%, have had this phone for about 3 months with no issues. Everything functions accurately: face recognition, camera, mic/speaker
Bought an iPhone XS. I was skeptical at first but it came with 90% battery life. Had a few scratches on the edges but besides that it's like new and flawless. For the price it is a Great deal.
Not a scratch on it anywhere, worked fine but battery at 85 % of new.

Got this phone to give as a gift. Was amazed to see the quality was just like new. No scratches and I couldn't be happier.Phone was delivered a day before scheduled delivery date. Good service and promised as delivered.

This phone arrived in fantastic condition. Not a scratch or dent. I would definitely buy from this seller again. The battery was at 93% capacity however great performance for a 18 month old battery. Great price, great performance.

Got the iPhone XS from FiestaRenew and it arrived on time and packaged nicely. Came with a new charging cable and box. Battery life was at 89 percent. Exterior was in near perfect condition, some light scratches on the screen and scuffs on corners but overall in great condition and everything works perfect so far.

column1: A good phone for the price.
column2: It’sa nice phone. Cosmetically perfect. Battery 85%.Hangs once in a while.But for the price I’m happy.
This was purchased for my grandson. He absolutely loves it! It was in perfect condition when it arrived and has worked flawlessly so far; about 2 months now.

column1: Una excelente compra el producto esta en excelentes condiciones
column2: Muy buena la compra el producto esta en muy buenas condiciones
Super happy with purchase. Looks brand new & saved so much money.
Bought this for my son. He loves it, we have no issues at all.
Love it for the price got 2 and they looked brand new

I bought this as a separate line to use for work. I wasn’t expecting a lot when I first ordered the phone.I was pleasantly surprised when I open the box to find what feels like a brand new phone. The phone came without any noticeable signs of wear and tear. The battery health was at 100% and there were no issues with the IMEI. I will update this review if there are any issues but this seems like a winner.

Now I was very skeptical about making this purchase but I must say well done. The phone is in immaculate condition everything works, the only downside from making this comparable to a brand new device however is the battery health it's on 83% but who's complaining. Will definitely be purchasing again in the near future.

column1: It will last a long time and perform as expected

column1: Lots of scratches on screen, hidden by screen protector
column2: Summary: Screen has a lot of scratches on it, otherwise OK.Long version:This product arrived with a screen protector already on it. Underneath the screen protector were two large scratches, visible from arms length when the screen was off or dim. As someone who prefers dark mode, this was a bit annoying. The product description says no scratches are visible at arms length, but this is either false or they mean when the screen is on bright.The screen protector was of poor quality: it collected fuzz and hair on the edges where the adhesive was exposed. When I removed the screen protector, I found that underneath it were many very fine scratches in addition to the previously mentioned deeper scratches.It appears that the seller uses screen protectors to hide the scratches on the screen.The device was shipped in a thin aftermarket box in a plastic padded envelope. I would have preferred that a fragile, glass front and back, electronic device would be worth enough to ship in a box with more adequate packing materials.On the plus side, the battery health is 97%, and the rest of the frame is in immaculate condition. No dust in the ports or speaker grille. No visible damage to waterproofing ring.Total, I rate this a 3/5: it's half the price of Apple Certified refurbished, but the damage to the screen is impossible to ignore. Next time I will spend more from a more reputable seller. For the amount I paid I don't feel like I got a good deal, but I also don't feel like I got a super bad deal. My purchase was through Amazon from a seller called BuySPRY.

READ BEFORE BUYINF.
When you buy a product like this, I hope you know that this is NOT what you would usually get at an Apple store. These products are hit or miss. I ordered an iPhone 8 last year and it looked new and it’s lasted me until now. But I wanted to switch it up and treat myself and buy the iPhone XS. With prime, shipping was great and only took 2 days. When I opened it up, the box looked like it has been ran over by a car. When I opened the box up, the phone looked fine to the eye, but as soon as I played music, it sounded like the speakers were being covered with how muffled they were. And that was without a case. When talking about the front facing camera, I’m pretty sure my old iPhone 4 has a better one.And it’s another thing to mention: in the fine print, the battery life says “they sell phones as long as they are above 80% battery life”. Mine was on 85% when I received it. Yes I wish it was higher but know that before you buy it that you MAY need to go and get a new battery inside your phone if you need it to be at 100%.LISTEN!!!Amazon Refurbished can be a great thing. They have tons of great, awesome phones. But they also have phones that are VERY cheaply made. Just be wary of that before buying.I hope this helps y’all before you buy!!

column1: Could have been better.. not a Woot! Woot experience
column2: I have to preface the review by saying that I was skeptical when making this purchase because of the mixed reviews. But I did my due diligence on different sellers selling renewed devices andchose Woot as the seller. I had good experience with Woot when I directly purchased from them in the past.Amazon Renewed Guarantee provide additional reassurance if something did not go well. (but there's always a catch.. more on that at the end).Product Delivery/Packaging: Very poor1. The product was not eligible for prime for some reason.2. The delivery took more than week but was delivered as committed.3. The phone was packed in Bubble Envelope ...not an Iphone box or any box but just yellow bubble envelope.4. The phone was wrapped in foam cover and then bubble wrap (see picture). Was really surprised the phone survived the transit. Kudos to UPS who handled this with such carePhone and Accessories: Average1. Phone itself was wrapped up in plastic cover and looked almost good, with very lil signs of wear and tear2. Battery was at 86% capacity which again was very disappointing and am not sure how it will hold up over time. I will update this review after using the phone for a few days3. The accessories included were more of joke. Yes, technically there was a charger and a charging cable. I say technically since charger was not an OEM charger and the cable would not reach from outlet to the phone. It was barely 6 inches long. No thats not a typo but it was not even 6 inches.Just Phone: Good(This is not a review of an iPhone XS itself, but the renewed phone delivered)1.As mentioned above the physical condition of the phone was good. There were very few signs of wear and tear2. It was ATT Model A1920 (MT8X2LL/A), fully unlocked with both GSM/CDMA Support3. I was able to register my apple id and update it to latest firmware.4. FaceID works and that was reassuring5. Screen Quality did not look as impressive as i would have thought from OLED. Need to compare it more. Will update the review.6. However, the battery capacity was at 86% which was concerning since I am sure it will deplete to bare minimum or less than minimum pretty soon. I will update this review and return if things go south soonAmazon Renewed Guarantee: TBD1. I was not aware that there could potentially be a restocking fee if a product is returned. I came across this information thanks to a response from an amazon customer in the Q& A section.2. Though on chat I was reassured by Amazon rep that Amazon would honor or help honor the guarantee within the warranty period.3. So I will update this if i even have to use amazon renewed guarantee. but still this is something to be aware of before making a renewed purchase.Overall, buying an expensive renewed phone can be a dicey affair. Wish there was much better or robust program around renewed phones.

column1: Great phone at an amazing price
column2: I couldn't be happier with my purchase. I previously had an iPhone 7 and was looking for an affordable upgrade. I got this XS 256GB for $520 and feel like it was an amazing deal. Out of the box, the phone had 100% battery health, no scratches, dents or blemishes, and was fully functional. In my case, you would never know that it was a refurbished phone.As far as the phone itself, I grow to love it more and more everyday. The OLED screen is incredible, face recognition is excellent, the camera and videos are really amazing, wireless charging is a great feature, and the battery life is such an improvement from my previous phone, which had the battery replaced once before. As a plus, iOS 13 runs beautifully on this phone and I'm really enjoying the added features. I could easily see myself having this phone for years to come, provided I don't break or lose it...Would definitely recommend to anyone looking for an upgrade but wants to save $200+ dollars on a new iPhone.PS I purchased my phone with Kiss Electronics. The phone arrived earlier than expected. Weird packaging, but like I said, in perfect condition (as far as I can tell).

column1: Be Careful From Who You Buy!
column2: I just received my iPhone XS that I purchased from the provider 'Woot!', and the phone itself is amazing. Runs like a dream, has 94% remaining battery life, and only two small scuffs on the sides of the body.However, I wasn't a fan of the way they packaged it. They put it a paper mailer with the bubble wrap lining, and the phone + accessories were loose inside. The wall charger was a Lenovo plug, and the cable was a 3-inch AmazonBasics cord. DON'T PLAN ON USING WHAT THEY GIVE YOU! The phone was individually bubble-wrapped and wrapped in plastic, so while it was safe, I'd rather it be in its own box.Overall I'm very satisfied with what I get, but be prepared to spend up to $50+ on quality accessories because these are unusable. I'd recommend 'Woot!' over other providers because I paid for a good used phone, and that's what I got. Not much more. I see other reviews and their nightmare stories of torn up, unusable devices. I'll update this review if anything changes. Thanks for reading!

column1: 90 days to try it, so buy it!
column2: My experience so far has been excellent! I was so nervous to buy a used device but I did my research and felt very comfortable with Amazon’s generous 90 day return policy on these renewed phones and I took a chance on a seller that had lots of positive reviews.~Seller~ All Out Mobile and was shipped through Prime and arrived three days early!~Battery~Arrived with 97 percent battery health and holds a charge all day long with pretty aggressive use.~Apperance~Extremely minor scratches on the side that all my cases cover and are so small that I couldn’t get a clear photo of them. The screen is beautiful with no burned out pixels, front & back glass have zero scratches.~Camera~Front & back both work perfectly and the lenses are clear.~General Functionality~I switched my SIM card first thenI used the Bluetooth option to seamlessly change everything over from my old iPhone 6 to this XS. Each app works perfectly. The switchover from the thumbprint to Face ID was easy & all of my passwords work (yay!) Upgrading from the 6 & iOS 12, operating this feels so smooth and delightful.~Packaging~It came with plain white packaging, an apple branded charging cable and power brick, as well as a device to pop out the SIM card.Honestly, besides not having the satisfaction of opening a brand new product... this feels brand new and saving hundreds of dollars feels even better.I highly recommend trying this service. I will update my review if something changes but at this point, one week later, I’m thrilled!

Horrible!!! I ordered and as soon as we turned it on the screen was green. I am about to check, but only showing that they refunded a $1 !!!! ..stating that the find my iPhone was turned on. We didn't even set the phone up because of the green screen. Ended up ordered through Amazon and got a brand new (not renewed) for only $100 more. Too bad it looks as though we have paid for two phones.

I received this phone and set it up relatively easy. The following morning I began to establish my logins for various things such as banks, and other services. I found it very suspicious that the phone began to act up. The screen became unresponsive, black and inoperable. What really concerned me is you could hear numbers being dialed, and other weird sounds. I processed the return following all instructions, my only option was to clear the phone via I cloud. Coincidentally the phone screen became active again shortly after. I was able to verify that the phone was no longer attached to my account and only a setup screen would pop up. My suspicious was further exasperated when the vendor contacted me asking me for my login info and then immediately turned around and said a refund would be processed minus the “restocking fee.” I paid just over $400 for the initial purchase, the “restocking fee” apparently is $375. The vendor has mad no other attempt to contact me or correct this error.

So basically you’re getting a refurbished iPhone with scratch free screen and back glass which is great, I was completely open to have a few minor scratches here and there and I was going to be ok with it, but I wasn’t okay with having all 4 edges of the phone full of Light to moderate scratches, battery health came as 95% which is not that bad, overall if you’re looking to buy a phone like this you would really have to think twice before making a purchase of you care about moderate scratches all around the phone, if you don’t, then this would be a perfect iPhone for you. One cool little touch is the SIM card pin, they include that in the box.

Bought this to finally upgrade from my beloved SE 1Gen , which I've bought multiple times because i like the platform. Because its being dropped from continuous support i decided to get an XS. The phone was in decent condition from seller [Woot}, it did have a small chip in the screen towards the top, but i didn't mind it. After charging both phones, I tried to sync them while next to each other, and it would fail after downloading the latest iOS update. This would continue and the phone would just reboot over and over. So i entered DFU mode and downloaded the update directly to the phone through itunes. Tried to sync, and still errored out. Tried to setup the phone without syncing, just barebones... still would error out and would stay in a continuous reboot loop. Tried to sync via icloud backup... error. I wasted a whole day trying to get this to work. Asked for my refund because this experience sucked.

column1: Great Phone, needs better packaging and charger.
column2:
I had gotten this phone within 5 days and it came in almost perfect condition. The battery capacity was at 94% and it came already charged (50%). A few issues I have are that this product does NOT come with a wall outlet or a pair of headphones, nor does it come in the original apple box. The phone came in a small, white box that was wrapped in plastic. I would’ve liked better packaging but the phone wasn’t damaged at all so I can’t complain. However, the phone should have came wrapped in a plastic peel that you see most new phones have just to prevent any scratches on the screen seeing as though the phone is made of glass. The iPhone XS itself gathers fingerprints easily due to the fact that it’s glass so please invest in a case and a screen protector if that is something that bothers you. Other than these things, I do recommend this phone (try to get the 251gb version if you can). Also! If you have Metro PCS , you will probably have to pay a fee to transfer your service to your new phone (that’s if the older phone is already under this carrier). Even though this is compatible with wireless charging, I DO NOT recommend you use wireless charging as your main method of charging your device. You could wear down you’re battery faster that way.

Edit : it’s been over a year and we are still going strong! Though the battery capacity is at 80%

The product came with a Amazon renew box with charger and screen protector, face ID works perfect, no scratches, 89% battery life (for being a second hand product it’s just fine), original screen.For those pre-k please who still have the iPhone 6s or 7 and don’t want to invest a great amount of money buying the 11 or 11 pro, this is a great option (was my case).

The screen had large amount of scratches that were hidden by the screen protector. Other than that the phone is fine and works as advertised. Battery is at 87% health which is okay.

Amazon Renewed description is “works and looks like new”. I received it with a light scratch on the screen and battery life at 90%. Amazon may say that up to 80% is ok, but my current iPhone is at 87% battery life and can’t go without charging every 4-5 hours. So 80% is BS.I’ll keep the phone as it is a good value for the money and i need a phone. I can pay Apple to change the battery in a year, but honestly, I think I’ll tell my friends to get refurnished from Apple. It has a better warranty, new case and battery. Worth the additional expense, in my opinion.

I purchased this renewed 256 GBiPhone Xs and hoped for the best. The phone came with 89% battery capacity, and not a visible scratch on it. I didn't expect to have 100% battery capacity and planned to replace the battery anyways. The phone has met all of my expectations and functions well. The only issue I have is that the screen lock/Siri button is super sensitive and is easily pressed in at times. I hope to get this corrected when I get my battery changed. I have had this phone for about 2 weeks now but I would say it was a good purchase.

column1: Phone and condition is 5 star, presentation/packaging is 4 star
column2: This is the 2nd Amazon Refurb'd phone I've purchased since I was 100% thrilled with the first one (Galaxy Note 9).The phone itself (IPhone XS) is 5 stars.Everything works and looks great.The 'refurb' aspect is 4 stars this time around since there was no plastic protection on the screen on this one.The first one I bought (Note 9) had this, so I would have expected Amazon (or their 3rd party refurb partner) to provide this every time, I guess not.That said, there was one small <1mm scuff on the middle-left of the screen, which could have occurred prior to being refurb'd or during shipping I suppose.Either way, it did come with a tempered glass screen protector which was a plus, and I can't see the scuff at all with the screen protector on the phone.Overall satisfied and would buy again - but I think Amazon/3rd party refurb partner have some inconsistencies to address in their refurb process.

I am LIVID!!!I got this phone last week and since I don't know too much about it I thought the sound and everything that was occurring with it was due to someone else's phone or it was isolated.I can barely use it because I can't hear anyone. Also, the touch screen is horrible and don't even mention the face recognition. It is rare that I have problems with Amazon products, but this was definitely my biggest purchase and by far the worst.
I got a new phone for half the price!!! 100% battery health, when received. I scrupulously went over it & THE ONLY blemish I could even notice was a barely-visual blemish on the camera bezel.

column1: Perfect phone for those 40 and older
column2: For a 2 gen behind iPhone it’s the perfect purchase at a perfect price.As an adult I don’t need the supposed latest and greatest as I actually use a phone for the reasons anyone did five years ago, this phone excels for internet searches, texting, phone calls, and is way better than a camera from the past.

Great phone. My only complaint about buying refurbished was the screen has two very minor blemishes on it. I can only see them when the screen is off. Does not affect my vision when the screen is on. I love that it came with a screen protector already installed. I have not had any issues with the phone. So far it’s a great refurbished phone.

The good- it looks high quality, big screen nice for videos. Battery is fine. I’m sure there are bells and whistles that would be good if I used them all. The bad - too heavy, too big, I hate Face ID- it doesn’t work for all apps. Or works then doesn’t. Annoying. I miss the thumb ID. I miss the home button. I really miss the headphonejack. I can’t charge and have headphones in at the same time. Also, I accidentally take screenshots all the time when turning it off or voluming up because the buttons are directly across from each other. Annoying. It doesn’t flip around when navigating so if I have it in the cup holder while charging, the map is upside down. And it re-routes me all the time. I miss my 6.

Even Apple Support and Geek Squad couldn't get it to stop restarting every few minutes. And of course this seller doesn't have the same phone to send to me as a replacement at the same price. column1: Not bad except the battery was toast - then things got interesting….
column2: The phone was for my daughter as an upgrade to an aging iPhone 6S. All worked well - screen quality was nice, face recognition and all else seemed to work as it should, but it quickly became apparent that the battery life was not at all what it should be. Checking the Battery Health (under Settings>Battery>Battery Health>Maximum Capacity), it was at 63%. I would think a strong battery would be rule #1 when you send out a “renewed” phone.After reaching out to the vendor, they agreed to replace it AFTER I sent the original one back to them. Two problems here - they seemed to expect me to pay to ship back their weak product and they expected my daughter to do without her new phone for what could easily have been 2-3 weeks. They did send me a shipping label after I asked for one but with a busy summer, the “without a phone” issue was going to be a problem, along with the fact that I didn’t know where we would be when they decided to send the new one to us.As an alternative, I thought that maybe I should just take it to the Apple store and pony up the $69 for a new battery rather than risk getting another phone a couple of weeks later with a battery that was at or below the 80% that Apple recommends as a minimum standard.After running the diagnostics, Apple said all was good except the battery. While replacing it, they broke the screen and then said something about calibration issues. Long story short, my $69 got me a new (or at worst an Apple refurbed) phone. But this was a particularly lucky set of circumstances - and it wouldn’t have been quite so good had my daughter not just backed up all of her vacation photos before we took the phone in to Apple.Basically, if you get a phone from this vendor, you might get one with a junky battery and you can either deal with weak-ish customer service and go through the hassle of swapping it out via mail or spend $69 for a new battery at Apple. Maybe the Apple store will break your phone and replace it for free too. \_(ツ)_/

column1: Great customer service if any issues
column2: Phone worked great for a little under a year. The face recognition stopped working, I emailed their customer service (original sellers not amazon) and they responded quickly and resolved the problem for me. Great customer service!

column1: Two Bad Iphone XSs -  BUYER BEWARE!!!
column2: My wife and I ordered identical Iphone XSs from this shop less than a year ago.As Amazon Renewed products, we were confident they would be of lasting quality.Cosmetically, they looked great and worked as expected at first.Sadly, both phones experienced critical hardware errors less than a month apart, rendering them useless.Both were outside the warranty by a few months.Perhaps we were just unlucky, but for the $, I would not risk it on another renewed phone that is not eligible for warranty through Apple.

I loved this phone up until a year later, it fell in water and the screen went out and now it won’t turn on or do anything. I lost all my pictures and important things I had because iCloud storage only holds so much. It was great up until this had happened. The battery did seem to die quicker after a few months of having it, and when I did receive it the glass of the camera was cracked but it didn’t bother me because it didn’t affect anything other than looks and I needed the phone then anyways so I kept it. All in all was a great phone up until recently.

column1: Please be careful... speaker distorts over 50% volume And battery life is horrible
column2: I was skeptical about ordering this phone after reading all the comments.. I gave it a shot and ordered a gold xs 256gb. After receiving the product and started using it I realized that the battery was decreasing rapidly so I rushed and checked the battery life which showed 96% I then received an update from apple which kinda fixed the battery life problem I had to buy a battery case in order to use it for a full day .. my other fault was that I couldn’t increase the volume over 50% or else the speakers would start to distort which is horrible.. I contacted Amazon for a partial refund since I could not return the phone because I’m currently on a business trip but all I got was it wasn’t possible... please be careful when u purchase this item

Within 6 hours of arriving and using the phone, the volume buttons stopped controlling the volume. Next, There was no sound from the phone at all- no ringtone, no videos nothing.Next, went the vibrations so I had no way of getting notified for a text or call. Then, I could not watch videos they would load and then screen went black. Finally, the wifi has a slash through it like wifi is not available and I have to restart it to fix it. I tried everything to troubleshoot. Not worth the purchase and time wasted.

Es difícil tomar la decisión de comprar un iPhone de esta condición (renovado), en mi experiencia me arriesgué a comprarlo desde colombia a sabiendas de que devolverlo sería difícil y algo costoso.El iPhone XS llegó bien empacando, en una caja del vendedor (no la original).El celular en su estado exterior llegó muy bien casi que 0 rayones, el estado de la batería en un 86%.Escaneado con el programa 3uTools se puede verificar que todas sus partes internas son originales. No ha sido reparado.El único defecto que presenta y que es casi imperceptible es un micro rayón en la parte superior derecha de la pantalla que para mi gusto personal no afecta en nada su estética ni su funcionamiento, es algo con lo que se puede vivir sin lamentarse.Otro punto en contra es que el cargador y el cable no son originales, pero son homologados y funcionan perfectamente.En conclusión, mi experiencia en esta compra ha sido satisfactoria.

column1: Good deal on a good phone
column2: I bought this phone after having the iPhone 7 since it came out. The size is the same, roughly, so I thought this would be a comfortable fit. I love it. The improvements are significant, and if you were worried about buying renewed, don’t be, because I have had no problems with mine as of yet.

El teléfono está en buen estado; pero creí que “Renewed” signifcaba “ Renovado” es decir: como nuevo y no es cierto; porque la batería llegó en 83% . Cambiarla sale en $6O aproxy la verdad es que por unos dólares más he podido comprar el XR nuevo en Apple Store con garantía.No quedé conforme con la compra a pesar de que siempre he tenido una buena interacción con Amazon.

column1: Phone Sound Completely Went Out 9 Days After 90 day Warranty Ended
column2: Phone was refurbished JUST enough to make it past the 90 day warranty mark.Then it completely bit the dust.Contacted seller to see if they could fix it but they declined.Would never order from this vendor again.Poor customer service and poor product sold.Caveat Emptor.

column1: The description for this phone on Amazon says that this phone is unlocked, not Verizon.
column2: I was totally blown away on how good my videos came out with the iPhone XS and my Hohem gimbal, thanks in part to the cameras, the wide and the telephoto cameras both have OIS, optical image stabilizer, which help stabilize the videos. The contrast is superb, the color is somewhat vivid, but not too much. The phone had a few scratches on the screen, but not very noticeable, other then that the phone was in like new condition. The only problem is that the battery life is at only 81%, I was hopping that it would be higher, but I can take videos at 1080p for about 3 to 4 hours, before recharging, which is ok for me. I can always have Apple replace my battery, very good phone.
Battery only holds full charge 5 hours. Send a new battery. battery is junk. Thats how to resolve problem. Don't e-mail and complain I'm hurting your business.

I purchased an iPhone XS and it finally arrived. It was nice to see that is was packaged very well to prevent damage from shipping! The phone already came with a screen protector which was really convenient for me. It does have a couple of scratches, but they aren't very noticeable unless I look at it really closely. Plus, I will have a case on this phone so they can't even be seen. The battery health is at 94% which is not bad at all for a renewed phone.The included charger is rather short, but it does its job. I would definitely recommend giving it a shot. I did not have trouble connecting this phone with my company (I purchased a fully unlocked phone) as I did with a previous vendor.

Small scratch on camera lens, which is a little disappointing. But the phone works awesome! The battery life is awesome. I love the phone overall. I had to get used to no home button. There is no fingerprinted, but the Face ID is great!
Para nada, esta todo flojo y no trae audífonos y el cargador es chino no es elOriginal no lo quiero

The phone could almost be mistaken for new if it weren't for some very minor dirt residue around the back camera lens frame which has absolutely no effect on functionality anyhow. The battery health says 100% (like new) so the battery must have been replaced in the refurb (sweet!). I had no issues transferring my old iPhone data/settings and after popping my ATT sim card in I was in business. Cameras and microphones all seem to be working properly although I haven't fully tested this. Feeling fortunate (and kind of shocked) to have found this for $380 less than what ATT sells one new. Highly recommend!

i forgot to review this but all i got to say is i took a gamble on this because i seen mixed reviews about these renewed phones, but i wanted to try out an iPhone again since its been years since i had one, my last one was an iPhone 3gs! when getting this phone in the mail to my surprise this phone came in pretty good shape, there are quit a few hairline scratches on the back and at the front, but its nothing u can really see unless ur focused on it and having a light shine on the area to show it more. the device works great, battery life seems great it was at 85 health when i got it, which basically is still new. overall im happy with it.

My phone came very clean No cracks or scratches And battery life was 100% I’m honestly impressed! I’d say go for it And ignore all of the negative reviews because that’s what I did and it landed me a great phoneI’ve had this phone for 2 months btw
We have used this same company several times now for phones and have always received great products and amazing customer service. Highly recommended.

column1: Phone is great; Charger not so much
column2: Overall, I'm satisfied with my new phone. This is my first iPhone after being an Android user. Out of the box I was extremely happy that the screen and body of the phone were flawless. It works great, I love all of my iPhone features from Siri, facial recognition, and the ability to heart my text messages. I love the size of the XS compared to the clunky Galaxy i had before. It came with a charger and super long cable, which all seemed to be in new condition. It doesn't come with headphones, which I knew from the description and other reviews. After having it for about 2 weeks, I'm noticing the battery life could be better, but this may also be due to my usage and it's still better then my old phone. Tonight my xs died while I had it plugged in and charging. An hour later, I still couldn't get it to charge which scared me and made me think it was something wrong with the phone. I switched charging ports and finally started to see a charge. So don't put too much faith in The "Ashley Audio and Accessories" branded charger so as not to get stranded with a dead phone. Replace the charger with something more trustworthy. The return policy seems pretty good and gave me piece of mind that if it was a problem with the phone, I'd have options for returning it without too much lost.

column1: All good, until it was pointless
column2: Looked good up until I tried to set up the facial recognition. It said it there was a problem with the TrueDepth camera, and facial recognition was disabled. It told me that I should update the software to resolve the situation, and if that didn’t take care of it, then I should take it to be serviced. I updated the software, hoping that would fix it, but to no avail. I will not pay more then I already have for the phone, so I am going to return it. Personally, if a phone says it is refurbished, that should mean all it's functions are in working order, has a good screen, and good battery life. It is fine for it to be dinged up a little, it's to be expected. But for one of the main functions not to work? Then the purchase was pointless, and has only made never want to buy a refurbished phone again.

This Renewed product is awesome.Better than I expected.Phone came with barely any scratch at all.There is one very small scratch in the face, but other than that it is immaculate and like new.Battery Health even shows 95%, which was better than I expected.Phone has been great so far.

column1: Literally in like NEW condition. Battery health is the trade off.
column2: Nearly perfect. When received it I looked this thing over with scrutiny and magnifying glass precision. There was NO indication that it could have been used by ANYBODY, ever. None. Essentially, a new phone. Set up was a snap and it went right on the off brand the charger included. Then, because of the reviews, my next step was to check battery health. A disappointing 87%. Off the mark of the promised 90% by almost enough to be a deal breaker. But due to its pristine physical and aesthetic condition, it’s going to be a keeper. And after the last few weeks of constant use, it’s held steady at that 87%.

column1: Definitely not new - but technically meets promised condition
column2: The phone I received just *barely* meets promised condition -- Maximum battery capacity 81%- Screen has pitting (at arms length arguably you would think it is a bubble in screen protector)Phone arrived with a screen cover on it. Underneath the screen had three noticeable pits (could put my fingernail inside largest, the smallest is better characterized as a scratch). I think it is really close to not cutting it in terms of promised condition. I am disappointed that the battery health is not better but it meets stated 80% or better.Bottom line: it is a good condition phone with a used price. I probably next time would not use the same seller (D'Tech Mobile) mainly because I think they were trying to hide the pitting with the screen protector as it would have/should have been removed as part of the refurbishing.

column1: Just like a brand new phone
column2: No scratches or anything. iPhone CS has no fingerprint reader but face recognition works like magic. I’m a very happy customer. Will do business again in the future.
Great condition, got a phone that had a great battery life and no damage, would definitely recommend especially for the dirt cheap price

No I don’t know them no I didn’t get any gift card or any discount nor was I promise any. But the delivery was super fast I mean a whole day earlier than expected, the packaging great, the phone literally like new one small scratch above the silent button that’s not noticeable. The only thing I’d say is the phone gets hot I’m not sure why maybe my usage and the battery don’t last long once again because my usage. I will not complain and will buy from them again I don’t use face recognition hence no rating and I didn’t wanna give an overall 5 star but I feel like I should.

column1: Almost good enough but not like new
column2: The phone had a larger than expected scratch on the screen. Scratch was about 1 inch and half.Maybe i had a bad unit. It was clean everywhere else and they put the screen protector on top of the screenBut for the price and like new conditionit stated on the description it was disappointing.
Gave to my son. It works great. Just what we ordered.

column1: The speaker doesn’t work overall works fine
column2: You have to use speaker phone option or headphones to talk with others . The camera works well and so does other functions of this phone .

Phone is practically perfect no scratches or marks at all I was impressed HOWEVER the speaker is blown so the audio is terrible and paying $460 I can’t let it slide I’ll be returning and trying again. Also my Siri can’t hear me unless I’m actually yelling at it. UPDATE I sent the phone back and received the one i ordered (both phones came a day early) the new phone is in just as good condition AND the speaker works lol siri works a little better but thats apples problem i think so im happy it was a bit annoying to have to return the phone i dont know how they didnt check the speaker quality but i bumped it to 4 stars but well see how the return goes hopefully they get the phone and refund me. Definitely recommend buying though regardless!

column1: Lots of memory with this phone
column2: I went from 6S to XS, a bit of a learning curve without the bottom button. Great seller, fast delivery, would buy again from them.

We spent hours on the phone with Verizon and even drove to the store to buy a new sim card during this pandemic (thinking that was the problem) only to find out that the phone cannot be activated because the previous owner of the phone did not remove the phone from their icloud find my iphone. How do they not check for this kind of thing!!! Ughh

column1: I am extremely happy with my purchase!
column2: My phone came today and it is basically brand new. I could not even find one defect with my phone. I found a single tiny scratch on my screen at the corner that is unnoticable with a screen protector. My battery health is at 98 percent also! My phone also came with an amazon basics charging cable, which is honestly better than Apple's OEM cable.

Phone came with dents, cracks and scratches along the edges of the screen, overall moderate condition but not worth the price paid honestly, maybe $600 max but that’s my opinion. I’d rather not wait more time to return it and get a new one since it will just waste time to get an item with the exact same condition back. Phone came with a cheap knockoff lightning charger, only charges on one side and overheats often. Shipping was fast and reliable. Item is great honestly but I would recommend buying the max same storage and everything because it’s the same price with other sellers.
This is a great deal and my phone was like brand new.Everything works and easy to get started.I am totally happy with this purchase and would come back.A no brained for me!
So it came in very good condition. It only had some light surface scratches. My battery is at 96% capacity so that’s a good sign. Overall it’s been great and have had no problems over two weeks.

Loving my new phone. Even though it is refurbished it is working like new so far and it looked new when I got it. Was a bit worried about going from an Android phone to Apple but the transition has been pretty easy. Would recommend this seller.

column1: Terrible it won’t even charge from the port anymore
column2: Do not buy this phone. It has so many problems like it won’t charge and the battery life is terrible. Just buy it from apple itself because it will be new.

column1: It's a decent phone literally made out of glass
column2: We bought my 14yo son this phone for his birthday. All his friends had iPhones and he wanted to get an iPhone so he could communicate better with them since Apple limits the way iPhones can communicate with Android phones. He's been happy with the camera and video abilities of the phone and the facial recognition is really good on it. The battery life on this phone is ok. Much better than his old S7 but won't hold a candle to my S10 5G. The biggest problem is the screen is brittle. I mean BRITTLE. He was having issues with the screen having image burn, which was annoying but apparently a common problem with iPhone XS. Well, we have the phone in an Otterbox with a temepred glass screen protector. We had the exact same setup on his old S7 that lasted two years without any real cracks. Two weeks he had this phone and he was just sitting beside me on the bed and it slipped and hit the floor, maybe 2ft or less. Boom, screen cracked. The tempered glass protector is fine, no damage to that, but the screen is broken pretty badly now. This must be the worlds cheapest glass on this thing. We knew going in to it that iPhone glass is not anywhere near as strong as the glass on Samsungs, but I didn't realize it was this bad.He is pretty unhappy with his phone right now and is saying he wished he just stuck with an Android.

column1: So far, great phone.  No issues
column2: The ONLY issue with this phone is that the battery life was around 92%.Surprising considering it can't be that old.Everything else about the phone functions perfectly.

Avoid the seller Buyspry! I bought a phone for my daughter and it wasn’t working right within weeks. I returned it and bought another one hoping it was a fluke because the seller came recommended. That one seemed better so I assumed we were good.Bought myself one from BuySpry and that one had problems. Returned it and bought a new iPhone SE 2020 instead.Now, months later, my daughter’s phone isn’t working right. There are various problems, the main being that the touchscreen is off, making texting difficult, trying to buy things or play games is difficult. Anything you use the iPhone for is incredibly frustrating.I reached out to the seller but it’s past the return window (May 2020) and they advised me to get it fixed at a local shop.Again, avoid the seller BuySpry. They’re reconditioned phones are terrible and it’s not worth the money.The XS itself, is only okay. My SE 2020 Is the only winner in this and we could’ve gotten my daughter one for the same price or less than the useless piece of junk BuySpry sold us.

I bought this phone back in May and using this as my very first iPhone has been amazing. I have the silver 64gb model and when it arrived it looked flawless (besides a couple of scuffs on the band but a case will make you forget) I was scared to buy a 2nd hand phone especially with an oled screen because of burn in but this phone came with none at all from what i can see. I got 84% battery health out of the box (wanted 90+ but hey everyone has a different experience) After almost 2 months it dropped to 83% which still isn’t bad since it’s a 2nd hand phone. Battery life is what you’d expect from an iPhone, but overall I love it and it serves me well. To anyone who’s skeptical and hesitant like i was before buying a 2nd hand phone, just buy it and save your money, it’s completely worth it. I literally bought a $1000 phone for under $400. Come on now! :D
Phone arrived on time, repackaged nicely & was practically brand new. No issues thus far but will update if need be!
iPhone is like brand new and works excellent. Delivery came on time. And I’m very happy with this purchase.

column1: Don’t use the charger or cube they give you.
column2: DO NOT USE THE CHARGER. This phone is great and all, I highly recommend buying. But I’ve learned the hard way with every iPhone I’ve gotten from through Amazon. The chargers damage the phone. They slow it down, they overheat it. Trust me, don’t use the chargers they give you. Stick with a charger from “5 & Below”, Walmart, Best Buy... Other than that tho, the device by itself is a great buy!

Compared to my 6, it’s different. Took some time getting used to no home screen. Occasionally the data/ wifi connection gets iffy. I still have the same plan as i did w my 6 and still the same circumstances (same home wifi, same job/ school ect) calls/ facetime will occasionally freeze/ sound fuzzy if i am not connected to wifi. That was never a problem with my 6 (my 6 was a GSM unlocked, idk if that has anything to do with it) I wear glass, and sometimes the face ID does not recognize me if i do not have them on. Battery life is great! And i like being able to access low power mode easier than having to go through settings all the time! All in all, good phone. I can tell you one thing, it is not worth $600+. The raw materials used to make iphones are worth less than $10. This was the best price i found for this phone, so thank you!!!
Great phone loved how long the battery last, the facial recognition works good, the screen is good, a lot of storage love the phone.

Phone arrived a day early. No scratches that I could find, phone looks brand new. 100% battery life. Seems to be completely functioning so far!I was hesitant to get a refurbished phone, but I’m glad I did! Worth the savings!It was just the phone and a charger, no other accessories.

The cellphone came with a big scratch on the side, it can be cover with a cell cover,was doing to returned it but my oldest daughter wanted to stay with it. So I let her have the cellphone. Other than that the cellphone git here one day earlier than the expected date.

The phone is in good shape physically but arrived with a fully depleted battery (not good for battery health) that (after charging) shows only 83% capacity, which means it will soon need to be replaced (at an additional cost of $69).
bought renewed. item exactly as rated/described by vendor.

The phone is in excellent condition with no visible wears. It came with a screen protector which I took off and there were no scratches on the screen. Battery life I got was 88% so that’s alright. All the features are working just fine even the face recognition. The only problem I had was when the phone turned on it was stuck on the “Hello” screen for awhile and there was no option to select next. I tried to turn off the phone but it kept zooming the screen when I pressed the off button. Eventually it worked and after that i had no other issues

The battery came at 78% instead of 80 or above, and the front camera is a little worse quality than you would think, idk if it’s a third party screen or anything like that but it seems to work okay. The charger port also had a lot of lint in it to the point where my charger only reached the bottom of one side. I had to clean it out and now it works fine, as well as the speakers. Other than that there’s two tiny scuffs on the side but all the glass is fine. It’s a great deal but kinda a gamble.

I love my iPhone XS. It was in excellent condition with new charger and cord. The only reason I did not give it a 5 star rating is because the phone restarts periodically on its own. I took it to the Geek Squad at Best Buy to run a diagnostic check to find a possible issue, but could not locate exactly what was causing the phone to restart. It does not happen all the time, but when it does, it can be annoying. I am still within my 90 day return window, so I will determine what to do if it becomes a bigger issue. But for now, I really like this phone, but wish operation was smoother.

column1: I got exactly what I wanted!
column2: I liked the fact that the product arrived earlier than anticipated and I loved the fact that it was exactly as described. I also had no problem getting it setup with my carrier.

column1: The notch doesn’t really bother me as much.
column2: I did have an issue with swiping.I tend to use the sides of my thumbs to scroll and it had minor issues with it.And the right side of the screen also had a few glitches where buttons or apps weren’t being clicked, even though I’ve pressed it.Could be the digitizer itself or the newest update it had (updated to 14.4.2, April 2021)Size-wise, it’s the same size as the iPhone 8 (which I used to use) and a lil bit of thicc to it.

Phone seems to work good and battery life is good. Was missing the lightning cable and wall charger was a Levon brand. they offered me a $15 discount for the missing lightning cable. Power brick was not compatible after I went out and bought a apple lightning cable. So a Second trip to the Apple store for a wall charger, everything is running and charging okay.
Order was delivered quickly, was packaged very well. Product was as advertised, in excellent condition.
It works & it's smooth.

column1: That after I spent $1,000.00 I would get a better service and not have to pay money to repair it!
column2: I bought my I Phone 8 and I have to take it to be repaired because the sound doesn’t work at all and I just bought it 2 months ago!
Easy to set up, perfect condition!Fair price.

column1: Refurbished items come with faulty battery
column2: Battery came at 78% health. Within 10 mins it's no longer working.

column1: Great price for a like new iPhone.
column2: My wife loves it.The box it arrived in was garbage and looked like it had been stepped on.Lucky for me I had an old iPhone X box that worked much better for presentation.No scratches on the screen with minor scuffs around the sides, but is in a case so you can’t tell.It only has 94% max battery life but I guess that’s to be expected.Oh and it only came with a charger and cable.
The phone I received was as advertised. Great condition and packaged like a new one. I have had it for about one month and no issues with the phone. Would recommend purchasing from this company.

column1: Lots of scratches and not cleaned but works
column2:
The device is definitely renewed, I new that going in to this.
Jemjem was my sellerThe screen has a lot of scratches I received a device that has never had a screen protector on it. There are a few scratches that are big the rest are micro scratches. This is the one thing that bummed me out about it. At the top of the screen it is a little rough almost like it has been replaced but with the amount of scratches I would be surprised.The device was not cleaned it had some dirt or grime in the crevices.The battery was as promised @ 83% so that was good.Everything works as it should the screen was just a complete bummer I wish they would rate it.I have ordered a screen protector to hopefully clean the screen up a bit.
Accurate and quality product just love my new phone and love the delivery service super fast

column1: Great phone, but with some caveats.
column2: Phone is in great shape, basically brand new minus a chip in the bottom corner, nothing to complain about there, however the speakers are basically blown out. Another factor is battery life. My phone came with 88% battery life.

Although I did get my full refund I had received a defective item that in only a few months began lagging and rebooting on its own. Couldn't even back up my I cloud which is so unfortunate.NOT A HAPPY CUSTOMER. I was enjoying my phone until that.

Bought two of these and they both were pretty much flawless. One phones battery health was at 100 and the other was at 87 which is acceptable. The only negative thing is the charging cables they provided are literally the absolute shortest cable I’ve seen in my life. It’s not even as long as the phone itself. Overall I’d give them a strong 9/10 just needed a usable charge and it would’ve been 10/10.
Very nice iPhone. When I try to switch from my old iPhone it showed up as locked due to the fact that our Sprint merger with T-Mobile but it all worked out. it’s working fine

column1: Buy from BuySPRY- Beware 13.4 battery drain
column2:
Excellent costumer service. No sassy snips or anything. They were understanding. The phone itself has no scratches on the back, the front came with a screen protector.
The ONLY reason why I'm returning this is because of the BATTERY. It's at 89% battery life but that's not the issue. It Won't last more than ~2Hrs with moderate use. My old android lasted longer (its just getting really slow and the battery isn't replaceable). Like 6 hours longer doing the same stuff. I googled and from what I found, its probably the IOS update its on 13.4 and from what I looked on the website- XS/MAX/XR and older was screwed over with some battery drainage bug.

column1: 87% battery life, mint condition, love it
column2: So I didn’t get the iPhone box, but my phone arrived with out one single blemish. 87% battery life. Runs as it should. Sorry to the people who had bad experiences but I’m very Pleased with my iphone XS.Paid a total of $579

The screen quality and battery life are acceptable for a refurbished product. The battery life is currently at 89% after the first couple of months of ownership for comparison. The phone's outside was like new when received, however, internally I began to have startling issues pretty early on (unuseable three months after purchase). My phone began experiencing a reboot loop and after being unable to correct the issue through updating and restoring, I brought it to a local trusted shop that found a damaged wire connected to the face id that was causing the issue. I had it fixed for $40 but I lost two months of data since my last full backup. The technician believed that the damage was likely caused during the screen replacement as part of the refurbishment process. My face id no longer works due to this issue, but otherwise is great. Hopefully this is a rare complication and perhaps buying a warranty wouldn't have been a bad idea. Otherwise, I love the phone.

I bought this phone from seller “woot” I’ve been reading reviews and see a lot of negativity but I just hold those in and take my chance and guess what... ThisiPhonexs is literally like new phone, very very very light scratch on screen like it so light you can’t even see it if you don’t use flashlight to search for it. Another thing I was worry about is battery health, I’ve seen lots of review saying they got85-93% battery health but since this is ‘renewed’ you expected to get at least 80% battery health but guess what.... this seller send me an IPhone XS with 100% max capacity battery health. I’m really overjoyed for that since it literally is a new phone at this point. Only reason I gave 4 stars is because of charger. They gave me 1-2 inches cable along with Lenovo adapter. Adapter was fine but the cable was too short I can’t even plug it on the wall but aside from that, I’m really happy with this purchased. Thank you Woot!

this is a fake phone. the phone is supposed to be waterproof, it was in my pocket in the rain for less than 15 minutes and stopped working. this phone was not ~renewed~. correctly and it was a waste of my money.also, face recognition doesn't work.

column1: Great external condition, although battery life guarantee could be better
column2: My device came in perfect physical condition with no scratches or bumps. Although, my battery health arrived at 80% which is the exact minimum for these refurbished devices. I ended up getting the battery replaced for a new one at the Apple store, which cost around $70 but the cost of the refurbished device + battery replacement was still ~$100 cheaper than if I had bought it refurbished directly from Apple. In my opinion, definitely worth it but just know that the battery health varies a lot across devices and refurbishers.

column1: Customer Service is very good if you find that the phone needs to be returned.
column2: Buying an iPhone XS at a discounted price (due to being used) seemed like a great value.Unfortunately, I have now purchased and had to return 2 of these phones due to different problems that had apparently not been fixed or observed during refurbishing. Both phones looked brand new. The first phone had a problem with the touch screen right out of the used box. I worked with tech support initially but after a hour on the iPhone thinking the problem was corrected, problem resurfaced.The second XS worked normally for about a week but then the display would occasionally distort for a minute or so.For the potential savings it may be worth the possibility of getting a beautiful used phone.You do have 90 days to evaluate and the vendor is very good about handling returns. If I could I would give 5 stars for appearance, and customer service but 2 stars to represent my luck in getting a solid iPhone XS.

column1: Amazon did not check this iPhone xs
column2: The sound is distorted. Even when I play clean acoustic music. Obviously no one checked the sound. This cost almost $500 of hard earned money. This needs to be fixed immediately
Phone is awesome!I have had no problems so far.Looks great and works great!

It is a good phone for the price, like people have mentioned it comes in a generic box, which to me doesn’t matter, since it bought the phone and not the box. It did come with a few minor scuff, I mean to the point were you can barely notice them and if you have a case you will never see them. It does have a small scratch on the back glass which you can only see in the right light and hold the phone just right, and again you cant see it if you have a case. It did come with a screen protector which is a nice touch. Other than that, everything works and looks great. For $400 you really cant beat it. Im giving it 4 stars because of the small light scuff marks. Other than that I would definitely buy the phone again if I had to.
I am thrilled with my phone!

Although the phone came in good condition and was early than expected there was a fault in the sound quality when I turned up the volume it became more distorted than it should be but I really don’t mind this fault since I use speakers anyways but to sum it up it came in a good condition for the most part and works good and is great for anyone looking for an upgrade

Battery was at 88% original capacity when checked. There are some imperfections along the perimeter of my phone and the weather will only tell me Cupertino. The flashlight button and camera buttons also do not work on the Lock Screen. Otherwise, everything else is perfectly functional.

It wasn't in "like new" condition and had scratches and scuffs on the body and screen so I returned it before I even turned it on and ended just buying a new phone. Without headphones, the value isn't really there.

column1: Update to previous review. The item actually came later that day instead of the 5 day delay.
column2: The phone is in great shape, no scratches or anything and works wonderfully.The only downside is the battery life. It has drained within a day all the while it wasn't being used.
Great price and so far working like should. A little trouble setting up but more on my carriers side than the phone.
Like new condition! Love it!

column1: Not the best for the price I paid for.
column2: The phone looked great but everyone has trouble hearing me, makes me think this phone had water damage. Which makes me wish I could return it.
I bought it for my wife and she loves it I wish I bought one for myself

I didn't want to be saddled with a yearly contract, nor could I afford a new phone.This is unlocked which gives me the opportunity to choose which provider best fits my current needs.I am presently in North Carolina, will eventually bespending time in Massachusetts and will also be in England for up to 6 months.I do travel quite a bit and this phone allows me many advantages.

column1: Kiss Electronics Ships an iPhone XS in Great Condition
column2: I bought the 256GB XS from Kiss Electronics INC. The phone arrived with 93% battery and was in generally good condition. There are a substantial amount of scratches on the screen, but they aren’t visible when the phone is in use. All aspects considered, I feel buying refurbished through Amazon/Kiss Electronics seems to be a better deal than buying the phone new (especially when including an insurance policy with the purchase).

Got the phone 2 days back. No scratches or dings - clean phone and happy about it. But the packing was pathetic - it came without a box !!
