That's strange and unheard of - you are selling a $380 phone without a box - doesn't mean it needs to be in the original box but a good hard box is a must when shipping a smartphone this costly !!Battery health is ok - 86% - fair enough since it was listed as above 80% only.

For the price you can’t beat it. Battery life is at 91%. There is a spot on the screen that is flawed, the glass must have been repaired or something and it’s raised up a bit. But to be fair I didn’t notice it until I put a case on it and it looked like a bubble in the case but I realized it was the glass. Doesn’t seem to interfere with the touch screen and although it’s kind of a bummer it’s not enough for me to return it.
No screen scratches!!! When I took it out of the bubblewrap it almost looked bran new. Very very small marks on the side but it is in excellent condition. I will be recommending this to friends.
Arrived with 91% battery capacity. A few almost unnoticeable scratches on the sides. Looks almost brand new. Works great.
Bought certified renewed, looks and works like new! Purchased from Kiss Electronics.
Phone came 1 day early in perfect like new condition! This is 2nd iPhone I purchased from BuySPRY and am very happy with them. The battery was at 84% and I only have to charge it every other day.

I was very hesitant to order fork this company after reading a variety of bad reviews. Luckily, my item came with none of the issues as seen in the other reviews. Although, I will say only my speaker on the bottom left does not work. The battery dies fast, faster than my 8 plus. Overall, I have no other complaints and will probably purchase from them again.

The package where it was delivered was the worse. Not even in a box just grapping paper. Then the charger is not even the best or long to charge the iPhone. My battery got at 88. I am fine with that. iOS got me problem with passing my date from my other phone to this one so I did it manual. I personally like the iOS aesthetic and that’s why I bought it. Was good for the price and I hope I can get more than two years with this for a upgrade. I love the Face ID. The emojis are nice. It looks aesthetically nice except for something in the screen a little scratch. Any than that I like it and will recommend it. Take beautiful pictures.

Great screen (technology OLED), perfect size (5.8) that will fit in your pocket. Updated are guaranteed until 2025. Great performance ( 4GB ram)
love the design and spectacular color (gold).Premium materials use in the construction of the device.At the best is the price I paid$305

column1: Live outside the US, be wary!
column2: Purchases two renewed iPhones, one for my son and the other for myself and within six weeks experienced problems. On one phone the touch screen was not working in the center as shown in picture. This problem keeps going and coming. We use it as is.On the other phone after attempting to do an update, the phone would not reboot with an error message 4013. Tried everything recommended online by the apple site. Had the phone assessed by an apple approved technician who said that it had a hard drive problem and paid $36 to repair.It works now but not the Face ID.For both phones I reached out to the supplier and on each occasion I was given the opportunity to return the phones and get replacements or a full refund. However, because I live outside the US the costs of getting the phones on US soil was too much. So be wary if you live outside the US

Pro: Arrived two days earlier than expected. Both CDMA and GSM compatible.Con: packaging was subpar, in surprised it survived shipping. The phone had finger prints all over it like someone else had opened the phone and it wasn’t charged. The plastic cover looked like it was the tear open type and it was already opened. Charger cord was off white and not apple.
Problems with the iPhone update with having to do a manual update.

There were several scuff marks and the phone doesn't look refurbished...it looks used and resold. DO NOT BUY from this company. In addition to an inferior product, they charge you a restocking fee and make you pay for the return.
I purchased this moving up several generations. The battery life is amazing and the screen quality is impressive

column1: BAD BATTERY and BAD SCREEN GLASS
column2: Bought this phone for a couple of weeks, still in the return period. This battery is so bad which can not even last for more than half day. Single movie would cost about 35% battery? Seriously?The screen glass is also too bad to use. I have no habit to use a screen protector, and I never put my phone with the key. I found the screen especially top half has some kind of wearing on the glass which I can feel with my finger touch. Due to this I can not read the words on that area of the screen clearly and smoothly. Feel the words very indistinct like having a shadow on the words. Some kind of gray pixels are also found, I did not know whether I saw gray pixels because of the wearing the glass and change the angle of the light.Face recognition is also very fair. If I hold the phone on the hand and set it apart like 1 ft then it can unlock pretty quick. if I wake up in the morning and hold it .5 ft to the eye then it can not unlock it anyway. Maybe I used it in the wrong way.Overall, the experience was bad, already returned for a refund. Never known a refurbished item could have a such bad screen feeling. Gonna purchase something else instead. Could be a pleasure if the seller returned funds real quick. :)

column1: Not sure if it is worth it
column2: Cosmetically the phone was okay, no major scratches. I was disappointed that there was a bunch of dirt between the aluminum lining. The speakers are clogged with dirt and the phone gets after using it a little while. The battery life is at 87% which is disappointing because my old iPhone that I am selling is at 94% which means I’m switching out great battery life for much lower battery quality even the phone I bought is newer. The tempered glass screen protect is put in crookedly which is annoying because it’s not that hard to put them on. I have 90 days so I’ll see how it goes. It also makes me nervous that I don’t know exactly what was wrong with this phone before. I’d say the price for the quality of battery life is overpriced for a used refurbished phone. Also it came with those crappy chargers you’d buy at a gas station. Probably won’t be using it because I heard if you don’t use an original apple charger it can decline the life of your phone battery.

column1: You get what you pay for
column2: Product came in almost perfect condition. Externally it's almost brand new with minor scratches, but one thing that was really odd was the speakers that are muffled. Other than that delivery is fast, battery health is 92%, and I'm quite happy with the purchase.
Fast shipping, great product.Thanks!

column1: Nice phone but not in Excellent condition.
column2: The received phone was beautiful, in excellent physical shape with no blemishes.The battery level was at 82%, which was slightly disheartening to me, as I previously purchase an iphone 6s from Verizon Pre-owned with an excellent battery health.I was expecting something similar with this phone, but that wasn't the case.I did reach out to the vendor about my concerns, but I did not receive a response from them.After a couple of weeks, I noticed that the earpiece speaker was crackling when I played song files on the phone.This discovery unfortunately led me to request a replacement phone, but I was not aware that Verizon Pre-owned does not offer replacement items.So now I am waiting on a refund.

column1: Not as good as I wish
column2: The screen si a little bit burned, scratches at the right side, 86% battery, but $350 bucks I think I'd good deal at least for me, but could be better

column1: Product was in good condition, but the battery was disappointing.
column2: I ordered two iPhone XS models, and when I opened the package I found no defects, scratches or anything worrying (aside from some dust around the camera), I did some diagnostic testing on both phones and everything was genuine and working properly. I was able to sign in with my apple ID and the phones were unlocked as promised, I had no issues with any of the software and my phones updated to the latest IOS with no issues.HOWEVER my only issue was that one of the iPhone's I bought had a battery health of 77% rather than the promised 80%, The second iPhone had a health of 80% (I guess that's what I was promised on the description). If anyone is going to order from here I would be more concerned about your battery health rather than the condition of your phone, this may be different for each person but consistently the battery is the biggest complain I have heard from renewed and refurbished phones.

column1: Sim card tray missing and sim port obstructed
column2: As the head line says, the tray that holds the sim card was missing. Which was disappointing to my daughter, who is turning 16 at the end of the month. This was presented as an early B-day gift, because her old one started giving out this week.Of course, I overlooked that the fact that the sim tray was missing and she discovered this after opening the gift.Anyway, rather than going through the return/figurative fist fight for a replacement or refund that would undoubtedly take a week or more to resolve; I decided to try and curb her disappointment by hitting a cellphone repair shop a few blocks away.The repairman was great! At first, we could not get the sim trays to fit. After attempting with several trays from various iPhone models that he had in his shop, he decided to open it and found the port was obstructed with a small piece of plastic. After that the tray fit fine and the repairman said nothing was owed, but I insisted and payed him something. If you're in the Niles, IL area his shop is at 7637 N. Milwaukee Ave, just outside the Chicago city limits.After finding out that there was a piece of plastic obstructing the port, I'm guessing someone at this resale shop decided just to ship it without the tray, because they could not get it to fit. Or, the shop is so disorganized that the phone was shipped by mistake. Either way, it was a pretty big mistake and I count myself lucky that I knew of a place that fixed it cheaply for me.Other than that, once the port was cleared the phone worked great and she is quite happy with it.

My daughter has been enjoying her phone til today. She was bumped by a fellow student and her phone was knocked out of her hands. The case didn't protect the back of her phone and it was shattered. She hasn't had the phone a month yet!!!
A part of the screen does not respond, face recognition does not work. Otherwise a decent purchase
It was so good!!! but my battery was 83 which isnt bad but wish it was higher!! Soo good thankss I recommend

column1: Phone was reported lost/stolen before sold to me.
column2: Phone did not work. I called my carrier and was told the phone was reported lost or stolen in Oct 2018. The phone had to be returned & I’m still waiting for a refund.
My wife is enjoying her new phone

column1: Probably won’t order Amazon renewed again!
column2: I was very excited to get a newer iPhone.I am not a heavy user and I don’t need the latest version.I went from an iPhone 6 to an iPhone XS.Mostly I chose this because the screen is of higher quality and it was only slightly larger than my old iPhone.The battery life isn’t all that good.The phone will now update apps which is good.The accessories sent were totally unacceptable.Woot did give me a $20 refund as compensation.I provided won’t order Amazon renewed again.

column1: Amazon Renewed, Strike one! Attempting a second time!
column2:
In all fairness, the phone arrived in excellent condition, not a scratch on the front or back.Batter percentagewas just above the 80% threshold, at 83%, was not really excited about tat.The big issue was FACE ID is disabled, and any and all attempts to reset failed.In all likelihood, this phone had it's screen replaced, which would account for the Face ID being disabled, a feature that is needed for using Apple Wallet.

In any case, for the price of this renewed phone, the issue should have been clearly stated.It was a big waste of time.Now I have to send this one back, and roll the dice with another renewed device, and hope it actually functions correctly.
It’s worth it. I was worried but the phone is in perfect condition, works like new. I will purchase my device through here I’m sure.

column1: Phone Bricked Within Half a Year
column2: Phone was bought on April 27, 2020. Worked perfectly through out the months I had it, used it daily and never dropped it. October of 2020 I was using it for work at night and screen went black, flashed green and pink very quickly, then seemingly turned off by itself. Tried to boot it back up but was greeted by an endless loop of the Apple logo. Never got past it and when I emailed the company about the phone bricking, they said they couldn't handle the issue due to the warranty only being for NINETY DAYS. Not even for half a year did they have the warranty and not even a year which is baffling. My phone bricked after buying it for myself for my birthday within 6 months, and the company warranty couldn't even cover me. Learn from my mistake and don't buy this phone without at LEAST getting a year warranty on it from somewhere, or just better yet don't buy the phone at all. Renewed is a false statement, these phones are more than likely refurbished.

I bought this phone for my wife. It’s already been one month. During this period i feel that the battery power has been frequently down and sometimes hitting problems too. There is showing battery life is 88%.

column1: Be careful with the renewed products
column2: Purchased 9/21 dead by 4/22...Phone is stuck in DFU with corruot image and no one can get it out.so the options are to send to Apple for the same price as what it cost to buy the renewed Phone, Buy another one or go back to Verizon for a contract change with phone discount and lose current plan...bad ones happen.I just want you to beware and backup you phone often!!!

The IPhone Xs arrived on time and in good condition. The battery health is @ 78% which is not an issue for my use case. The only issue was the charger cable. Included was a USBC cable which will not work. The Xs has a lightning port. Overall I am satisfied with the purchase.
Exelkentcondition

My phone came in great condition. It already had a screen protector on it and another screen protector to protect that one! Also came with a charger but not the original one. Still works great. Definitely happy with that purchase.

column1: It works and is in like new condition, at least the one I received
column2: It’s legit, was kind of skeptical but the phone came in great condition. Glad I got a deal on it
The phone works wonderfully.No complaints about looks and use. My battery dies quicker than it should but that is kinda what happens when you get a refurb phone. I expected shitty battery.
I love this phone. It was a great investment for me, especially since I'm going to be making videos and recordings! Great camera quality :) love all of it's features! Definitely recommend

column1: The apple iphone xs is a good product but has some slight downfalls
column2: The phone is a good product but there are some slight downfalls for the product for example the battery life dies extremely quickly the face recognition is not that well because after a couple of weeks the face recognition will stop working and you will be forced to go to apple to fix the problem If you go into recovery mode it does not work 100% of the time. Although it has some downfalls i do recommend it to people who would like to use this product!

Phone came in really good condition if you’re looking for something that can be delivered fast and is good quality this phone is it and it’s fairly good priced I have stuck with this phone even after I broke it last time because it’s just so versatile! Doesn’t come with the original Apple charger or box but it comes with a. Charger and box and that’s it

The product is almost like brand new but the battery is 87% which disappoints me a bit but I’m also lazy to return it and despite it being only 87% I only charge once a day and still work fine. I am quite an phone addict though. I keep surfing pages and go on Facebook Instagram. Not a heavy video watcher or game player.
This phone was literally brand new! I love it, it is unlocked & had no scratches or smudges. Perfect seller.

column1: Came with a aftermarket LCD screen
column2: First off the few pros: The condition of the device itself was really good and came with solid battery health (94% on my unit)The main con and why I returned the device was the aftermarket LCD screen it had installed instead of OLED which the iPhone XS should have. The entire point of buying a XS is because you want that nicer screen otherwise I could have just got a XR instead. The LCD screen also has a slightly thicker bezel near the bottom. I will not buying phones again from Amazon Renewed as you just don’t know what you’re getting and the seller might have replaced the screen or replaced other parts without disclosing it. I’ve usually bought my phones and tablets through Swappa and never had a issue on there + you can actually see the device you are getting. I will be using them again instead.(In the photo on the left is the XS with the LCD screen and on the right is my 11 Pro with the original OLED screen. If the XS was using a OLED screen it would have been pure black.)
The phone was received quickly, worked right out of the box and even had a screen protected affixed.I have been using it for over two months with no issues.It was worth every penny.

column1: Batter Health Lost 5% Within a Month
column2: We purchased two of these phones. Everything works and looks good. One of the phones came with 85% health and the other 83%. Within less than a month, the battery health of the 83% has dropped to 78%. Disappointing.

column1: Great phone better then I expected
column2: Phone charge 100% in great shape like new love it

I ordered this item with Electronicity USA. Straight out of the box, it looked good. However, when I tried to activate the phone, there wasn't the necessary IMEI number in the settings. This means that the iphone was either stolen, or the internal logic board is faulty (according to google).Additionally, the headset speaker (top one you put next to your ear when making a call) was clogged and tin-ny. The audio quality wasn't great, and I wasn't able to clean the debris out myself.I didn't take stars off for this, but I also received a phone that was well out of the general AppleCare warranty. This means the iPhone was sold by Apple over a year ago. This is obviously expected for a refurbished iPhone, but keep this in mind that in case you have a problem with your iPhone.EDIT: I was wrong about the missing IMEI number. The headset quality was awful, so I took off two stars for that, but I raised my rating from 1 star to 3 to reflect my mistake.

Cosmetics of this product is great, I had no problems transferring my info/SIM card, and I’ve been able to easily access anything via Wi-Fi or with my apps. However, phone calls are not very good at all. I can barely hear when it is on regular (and the volume is all the way up), so I have to put it on speaker to hear anything. And even then, sometimes it glitches and I can’t understand what the person on the other line is saying. I I have contacted the seller to see how we can resolve this issue.

I’m so pleased with this purchase! The phone is absolutely beautiful, not a single scratch or dent is present! I was kinda weary buying a refurbished phone but I’m so glad I did!! Definitely recommend!

So battery life is at 84. Would have definitely liked better.Minimum was set at 80 and will probably have to replace soon. Still a good price for phone even if I do a battery replacement.Positives phone is in great shape screen and back are perfect. Seller included a case which wasn’t included in description which was a nice touch.Shipping took forever with fed ex six days longer than it said at time of purchase but seller shipped same day so not a problem with them.

column1: Description vs actual product not the same
column2: There was an alarm on the phone as soon as I first powered it on, and the battery did not seem to last more than a few hours with moderate use.The phone was pretty scratched up as well.

column1: High value for the money if you don't care the look
column2: Very happy with the purchase, the product is like brand new, the ugly it's the cheap and bulk package and poor included accessories.Pros:-iPhone it's practically like brand new, no single one scratch, battery life at 91% out of the box and both screens in perfectly shape.Cons:-Bulk and ugly package (don't you think about it for a gift)-Neither travel charger or cable are genuine-Lack of quick charge travel charger (even its was generic)

column1: Make sure the phone is certified refurbished by Apple
column2: I ordered the phone in the beginning of December. It almost took a whole month for my phone to get here even though I have prime. When the phone finally got here I noticed a bunch of scratches and indentations on the phone. When I turned on the phone I noticed lines going straight down across the entire phone that did not go away. I am not sure if the phone is broken or if it is something inside the phone itself. Fix this this is horrible. Not only did I have to wait 2 to 3 extra weeks for the phone, And when I finally got it the volume down button didn’t work properly And the screen displays lines going straight down across the entire phone (broken). Please all I wanted was a good phone. The disappointment

column1: MAKE SURE PRIOR OWNER’S PHONE NUMBER
column2: number and ownership is no longer associated with the device because you will have trouble accessing anything. Do not waste your time personalizing it whatsoever until you know it’s clear and you don’t have to return it.ATM, Icannot access my previous acloud accounts as it wants to send a code to a “trusted phone number” which is obviously not mine. There is no alternative. It also won’t let me make a new iCloud email.Very annoying. Waiting for seller feedback and then I’ll edit review. Would have been a five star. Now it’s a one on stand by.Lastly, it’s not very accurate when you try to use your finger to move the cursor where you want it in your text box. Guess that would be a four star vs five star if I didn’t have my other issue.

column1: Camera issue/ Two green dots in camera (selfie)
column2: The phone it’s fine, it was in goodquality, when I first got it I was kinda surprised the phone came raped with a plastic without a charger and nothing else however it wasn’t in bad quality everything worked fine but there’s this issue that I hate with the camera, there’s two green dots in the front of it (selfie) feature and it stays there in every app the camera is used and I tried to get some support with apple and they couldn’t be able to help. If they were I would have to pay $549 and that’s even more than what the iPhone costs. I wouldn’t really recommend to but this phone if you really like taking selfies
Got the gold XS, feels brand new. Battery health is 94%, condition is basically brand new. Looks like it was used for less than week. I would buy from This seller again

I got this phone on nov. 15, and at first everything seemed great! then a few days ago roughly around Feb18th, and maybe even before that, the phone stared glitching and battery life all of a sudden decreased dramatically, and the phone over all started running really slow and over heating within minutes of use. I contacted the seller asking about an exchange since "they guarantee like new" and seeing as it was only a few days past the 90 days i thought they wouldn't be like apple and take the phone back and give me another one, since they can fix the faulty one they sold me. Apparently though, that is their actual game. Make the phones good enough to last the 90 days and then they can wash their hands of it. I mean at least apple gives you a year, so that you can at least feel semi justified in re-buying their phone a year later.The fact that their refurbished phone broke legit less than 2 weeks post the delivery date is a HUGE red flag. if this was a case of a year or something I would get it, but less than two weeks?!? This is defiantly a we only make it good enough to last until we dont have to care but can still charge a boat load energy.I do not recommend buying this as you will have to buy another one in 3 months. might as well buy a brand new one since you'll end up spending close to $1000 in 6 months. The only solution they gave me was to contact amazon, who will more than likely tell me they are sorry for the inconvenience but that is the policy and cant do anything to help....i knew better but I hoped i'd be wrong.

Phone can't keep on for the day without dying. Battery life said it was at 75%, therefore 1/4 of the life is already gone, however, the battery dies so quickly. It seems like it was at 50% and not 75%.
Battery will need to be replaced soon.
Great product! The phone was in perfect condition with 95% battery health.
It did work like new except for battery life which is not bad for a 3-year-old phone.
My husbandwas so happy with it.

column1: Really great phone to get! But there are still chances you have to take
column2: I was quite skeptical about the phone from the reviews but actually the phone is great! It wasn’t blacklisted, no cracks on any of the glass. Only thing wrong with it was this extremely tiny chip on the top which is basically nothing. The battery life was at 82% which isn’t bad! I think its a big win especially since its a 60% discount from the Original price from it! After a couple days of use the audio had a bit of a problem like where it sounds like water has gotten into it, I cleaned it out and it kinda sounds the same.

Everything seems fine, it is used i can tell because of the little dirt and a small scratch on the screen. They also put a screen protector on it as well, so it’s definitely refurbished i can tell. But the color movements and memory is right on point.We will see how it does when i actually use it as a phone.

column1: Not to bad but at the same time not the best
column2: Alright I was a little skeptical about buying this phone. I did some research before hand and ended up with this. First things off, the screen, it’s a little scratched up but overall looks fine. I was lucky and ended up with a 92% battery health so that was fine. The back was clean I guess but there were some scratches too. The packaging was ok but the charger that came with it was awful. I’m giving this a 3 star based of -1 star for many scratched and -1 for the charger. Overall I think this is okay? Not the best but not the worse either. I guess if you wanna save a couple hundred bucks this would be a deal but being honest I’d just buy a new phone.
It arrives me a broken motorola. Not an iphone.

column1: Nothing i think everything is good
column2: I liked the phone is so beautiful
It works normally but the delivery is about 9 days.

column1: Mostly Good. One important feature is not working.
column2: Face ID does not work which I gave a single star but really it’s not working at all. The phone was in good cosmetic condition but slightly more light scratches on screen. The cover that came on it was thick and definitely masked them. Battery life is good. Considering returning the phone as there seems to be a physical hardware issue with Face ID. Updated iOS and problem solved every possible angle. The phone shipped in a timely manner and the box was packed nicely. I’m not sure if that is one of the features they check before mailing back out. It’s a key feature so it’s a big deal. I reached out to customer service and I’m currently waiting to hear back.
Si usted requiere un buen dispositivo con funciones más actualizadas, es un buen artículo para adquirir.

column1: This iPhone DOESNT have an APPLE certified battery
column2: Everything appeared fine when I first got the phone, when I started the setup process I was so happy to have an iPhone again and then the worst happened…. I got a notification saying that apple can’t verify that this phone has an apple battery, I can’t see the battery life percentage but this phone dies at the speed of light. Due to this inconvenience I have to go through several methods of contacting the seller (which has been easy) for a replacement and will probably be without a phone for god knows how long…

column1: Used devices, not renewed or refurbished
column2: Firstly the shipping was great, I received the phone a day early, a nice surprise. However on to the negative, I was surprised to see scratches on the main body, and chipped glass on the camera. I was ready to accept the device as is, even though the description said “Renewed”. After updating and finally getting my account ready, I noticed the speaker was very quiet when ringing. I tested videos and phone calls, all were the same. This was a dealbreaker and I cannot accept a phone with this kind of malfunction. It’s better just to purchase a refurbished iPhone directly from Apple with a full year warranty rather than gambling on a used device from here. Even though it was an Amazon retailer, these kinds of defects still come through. 2 stars for shipping, no stars for quality.

column1: Phones work great! Very happy with it.
column2: I got it two days later was awesome. But as I looked at the size I had realized I ordered the wrong one. So I ordered the right one and they are processing my return quickly. Now I am a little disappointed that when I ordered my correct one it took a week to get here. ♀

Note that there is no charger with the phone, so the charging connector that came with the phone is for Type C, and there is some weakness in the wireless network in the phone, and I was hoping the battery would be better

It works though my Memoji doesn’t during FaceTime. Not sure it’s worth what I spent and sometimes it glitches terribly especially when I update or add contacts (weird.) The battery life is absolutely horrible. Takes forever to charge and dies really quickly. It also disconnects my headphones randomly then reconnects. I like it for the most part since I needed it asap but plan to replace soon.

Item description is inaccurate. "super retina display,OLED screen"Screen has been replaced with a cheap display. All colors are faded and the screen doesn't even sit properly on phone. While holding phone the edges of the protruding screen constantly feel rugged on your hand.

column1: Iphone worked only for two months
column2: Keyboard stoped working

column1: Back camera was broken and screen was weird
column2: Don't buy, it's not worth the risk, purchase from apple instead

lousy customer service, the iphone I bought started to fail after 36 days, the touchpad didn't work well so I decided I would return ittry to contact the seller to tell me what were the steps to follow for the return and I only got short and nonsense answers, in the end I had to send it on my own paying the shipping costs when they received it they invented that the iphone had a crack in the screen and that for that and for not having the original box that was a generic box they would discount almost 130 dollars, and I say that they invented it becausewhen I bought the iphone I also bought an otterbox protector and a screen protector so it is impossible for the screen to break or crackpésimo servicio al cliente, el iphone que compre empezo a fallar luego de 36 días, el panel táctil no funcionaba bien así que decidi que lo delvolveríatrate de contactar al vendedor para que me indicara cuales eran los pasos a seguir para la devolución y solo obtuve respuestas escuetas y sin sentido, al final tuve que enviarlo por mi propia cuenta pagando los gastos de enviocuando lo recibieron se inventaron que el iphone tenía una rajadura en la pantalla y que por eso y por no tener la caja original que era una caja genérica descontarían casi 130 dolares, y digo que se lo inventaron porque cuando yo compré el iphone tambien compré un protector otterbox y un protector de pantalla por lo cual es imposible que se quebrara o rajara la pantalla

Comparing to many modern android phones, apple battery not as big in terms of volts, but still least for more than a day. Comparing to iPhone X this model has much faster face recognition.Overall: 4.25/5UPD: after a few weeks of regular use it stopped booting in. Returning the product back to seller.
The item came on time for being a refurbished phone it works great I have no issues with it right now so yay loved buying from the seller
OMG.. It’s not working after 1 week.When I got it, it was works well... But it doesn’t working now!!

No visible scratches, scuff marks on the screen. Battery charges normally. Functions like new. Overall very satisfied with this device. Looks and works better than I expected. Hopefully it lasts this way for a long time with no issues.

Phone came with a slight scuff and OK battery life 84%. Really depends on the seller i ordered two other phones prior to this one and they both had to be returned for excessive scuffs and bad battery. This phone overall looks good so I will be keeping it

column1: Phone was received with scratches, a detached screen and a replaced battery...
column2: Bought this phone last year. This phone, despite all of the problems I received it with, is a very solid phone. The iPhone Xs is a very well made device. The problem with this one I have though, has more to do with the quality and defects of my device. I received this phone last year, and the battery would take so long to charge; it only got up to 80-85% and just stop charging. This doesn't happen anymore (not sure why). But another problem that arose after a few months of use, the screen has lost some adhesive power and is detached from the screen; leaving a huge gap at the top corner. 3/5 stars.

Personally I was a bit skeptical about the product, it came pretty quickly which was a good sign. The box was a bit beat up but that was due to shipping, but everything inside was in a well and working condition. It came with enough battery life to get everything setup and still have time left over. There were no scratches or dings, just a bit of smudges that easily can be cleaned up. Everything seems to be working just fine so far!

column1: Pretty decent, would recommend if you’re in need of a new phone but don’t wanna break the bank.
column2: The phone was in really good condition, there were no scratches on the screen on the back glass. Battery capacity came in at 81% which was explained in the product listing.Word of caution though,I received a Japan model iPhone where they have a law that the camera shutter sound must always activate when taking photos. The phone I received works fine except for this. And seeing as I’m in the US I would’ve liked to receive a US model phone because that camera law does not exist here.
This is a terrific model- has everything you need in an electronic device!

column1: My phone looks and works like new. And it came early.
column2: I got my phone today,03/22. And it looks like a brand new phone.There was no scratches or dents.The face recognition works perfectly . The only negative thing I can say (AS OF NOW) is that they could have cleaned it better.I know it is used but still let the new owner get that new feeling. I want to use the phone for 30days then I will update yall.

I ordered an iPhone XS from the seller BuySPRY. At first glance, the phone appeared to be in excellent condition, with no dents or scratches on the back or sides of the phone. It also arrived with a maximum battery capacity of 85% which I was ok with, as well as a charging cube, cord, and a SIM card ejector tool. However, the phone came with a screen protector that hid many scratches. This included a scratch that ran the entire length of the screen. The scratches are noticeable at arm’s length with the screen off. Even though I didn’t see the severity of the scratches until I removed the screen protector to put on a different one, I felt that it was dishonest not to disclose the condition of the screen.

column1: This phone lived up to its description
column2: i got this for my 17 year old grandson. He is very happy with it.Refurbished phones from Amazon have been great for me and my family.

column1: scratched and the speaker dented, battery eh refund was easy
column2: I was upgrading from a 6s plus. It arrived earlier than expected, and the front screen was great looking, however…. Both aluminum sides were completely top to bottom full of scratches, there was also scratches around the camera, and the speaker on the front had a dent in it. The battery was at 84% which is lower than my current iPhone 6s Plusso for over 350 dollars I really wasn’t that impressed, I know it’s refurbished, just not worth a couple hundred dollars to me? I returned it, they were really far with my refund so I will give them that! I was worried about losing my button but the facial recognition was honestly pretty quick every time. I just ordered the iPhone XR from a different seller, let’s hope it’s a better experience!
Bought it as a gift for a friend, screen ended up needing replacing. It otherwise worked fine.
Item was totally off! Very disappointed & still haven’t received my refund

This was my first time buying a phone on Amazon. I was slightly disappointed because when I took of the plastic screen protector I noticed, even at arms length, there was scratches all over the screen. Other than the scratch’s on the screen it’s overall a good phone. Has great battery life, face recognition work and so does all the buttons. I mean I use this phone for work and I absolutely love it, maybe I got a scratched up one because that’s my luck. If that true, I highly recommend this product for anyone looking to upgrade their phone without paying half a grand or more.
basically brand new, works perfectly
When i take pictures with the flash on the color just isn’t there... but over all no more problems!

Almost everything wrong with the phone can be covered up with a case! There was a few scratches along the sides but a case would fix that. The battery came with 85% health but a replacement would only be about $60. There was a small scratch on the top of the screen but I can see it unless I look for it. Definitely worth it especially if your on a budget!!

First Purchase:After reading good reviews about Hybrid IT, I ordered one but the phone I received had lag issues.Reason was battery needed service and was at 78% instead of promised 80%.Return process was easy, seller provided UPS return label.Second Purchase:I gave Hybrid IT one more shot, but man I was wrong.I noticed there was a gap in between screen and frame, initially I thought it was screen protector,Upon looking closely found the screen was not sealed and it was popping a little bit when pressed on.I initiated return process, this time the process was terrible,Response was super quick, but the help kept trying to convince me its the screen protector, in-spite of sending pictures of the moving frame.

column1: Dud phone, likely due to tampering
column2: These people tamper with the phones in order to unlock them, in my case it arrived unable to be updated to any version of iOS, rendering it useless, as you have to update to restore from backup. It's also unable to be restored to complete factory reset (through the recovery screen reset method using itunes).I got on the phone with them and they told me to "Wait a couple of days" because there's a problem at apple's end.Joke is on them, I talked to apple to try and get this thing updated but no matter what we tried it was impossible. The phone is a dud and they want me to wait a few days? Get real!

column1: the screen is good, some scratches on the edges
column2: Battery health came in at 85%, but I believe that was expected.The screen looks like new, no details.Some scratches on the edges but not a big deal.(see the pictures)

column1: Reason NOT to purchase renewed items
column2: When you buy a renewed item you would expect it to at least have better battery life than almost worn. Apple says when the battery life gets to 80% or lower , it’s considered worn and should be changed. So I pay more than $300 for an iPhone XS and now I would have to pay Apple to change the battery. These items are supposed to be tested and checked. Apparently the one that checked mine was drunk or forgot their glasses that day and passed this one. If it sounds like I’m a little pissed then you would be right. First it was late being delivered and then I set it up only to find the battery life was close to being worn. My granddaughter loves the phone , only had a couple days and I’m wanting to send it back but she will be without a phone for who knows how long if I ask for a replacement. I’m really torn on what to do. Pay to have the battery changed or send it back and just buy one from a more reputable store. Don’t get me wrong , the phone is in beautiful condition. No scratches or dents or dings , just the battery. Dilemma dilemma.

column1: Great Price for a phone in great condition
column2: It works as expected.

column1: Great buy, but had to return it.
column2: The phone was in excellent condition, minor hairline scratches along the edges of the shell but not really a big thing. Screen was excellent, battery capacity at 95%. Box came with a charger and usb lightning cable. Everything ok until i had a software issue, had to return the phone. Seller was very responsible and had very good customer service. No problem dealing with the process of receiving the device or issuing a refund (Replacement was offered too). I bought it from WeDeliverWireless. Great service and devices.

We have owned it for a while now and while it works fine and looks fine battery life is now well below 80%.I think it was about 84 when it arrived.I think phone is good for about a year and then needs battery replaced or buy newer phone.

column1: DO NOT BUY A USED PHONE FROM AMAZON
column2: I must start with "I'm a huge Amazon fan and a (very) regular customer.On this item though?Bottom line:DO NOT BUY A REFURBISHED PHONE iFROM AMAZON.In the third month of ownership, my contacts begin saying, "you're breaking up."I, of course, thought it was them or the cell coverage, because I have a "new" phone.At the four month mark, on just about every call, after about 3 minutes, my contact reports my sound is dropping intermittently until finally they can hear nothing.I reached out to the seller, Refone.No response.I reach out to Amazon, "we'll try to get an approval return."Ultimately, the response from both Amazon and the seller?"Too bad, so sad."$450 for 3.5 months?Save your money.Buy from a trusted, local source.

column1: I like the phone but.... it has issues
column2: The phone run hot I’m almost tempted to return it seriously

The phone is great. Came in a standard white box with a charger, was easy to transfer everything from my old phone to this one, although when i deleted everything from the other phone i had, i lost some contacts. Opened it up, the phone felt sticky but nothing a little disinfectant couldn’t fix. Everything else is great. No complaints.

Although the phone runs smoothly most of the time, it lags and has some glitches here and there. The battery has 84% battery life, which is part of the deal, but I can really tell that it isn’t the best condition for it and it gets really hot when charging. When it comes to aesthetics, there a few tiny scratches mostly in the sides that you can only see up close. Overall for the price, I think it’s a good deal.
Love my new phone!

Tiny scratches under the phone (unseen to be honest). Face recognition sometimes have problems, but it's great. Phone condition in general is working as intended and battery life it's in great condition too. Really great!

The cellphone I bought is a renewed one, it came almost perfect, screen and back pannel PERFECT not a single scratch, BUT the bumper really showed it was a used device, not new and clearly used, however, cellphone works just fine, nor a single problem and battery status is at 86%, once again, not new but not bad.

column1: Doesn't turn on, and odd shaking noise
column2: I got the phone in a odd box with bubble wrap around the phone, not a great start. That doesn't matter much to me so i continued to stay positive, its also worth to note i got the last one in stock at the time, but i thought that wouldn't mean much. When i got it the phone has a fairly loud rattling noise when i move it, and while i charge it it's in a continuous off and on loop. I have tried force/hard restarting it and letting it charge for a while now, this sucks because i don't understand how you can ship out a phone that fails to even boot up. Its also fairly scratched up and i'm honestly scared to even try to fix it at this point in fear of being more disappoint about battery health because at this point i do NOT have high expectations. Sorry for the long paragraph but it needed to be said.

The phone performs well was in nice condition however it was not renewedJust cleaned they arrive with a used batteryThis being said I can’t recommend them or would I purchase anotherI asked for a partial refund and was told I could return the phone rather rudely

Perfect.Only a few light scratches at bottom of screen which you can’t see with screen protector on it.Sides and back were perfect.Camera lens was perfect.Battery at 94%.Saved a lot of money and got the phone I wanted.

column1: Apple iPhone XS screen too small for my liking
column2: Apple iPhone XS is a great phone and the seller kept his side of the deal.However, when I received the phone, I was not impressed due to the small screen size.I have shipped it back through UPS; and ordered Apple iPhone XS Max, 6.5", 512GB instead.

Shipped expeditiously. Facial recognition is amazing and works like a charm. Came with 85% battery health (could be better but I’m not usually one to complain). Glass on the back and the screen are in amazing condition. Extremely small scuffs here and there but an over all great buy for the price. Thank you! :)- A satisfied customer

column1: Battery life is not as mentioned. It has not cleaned poperly.

column1: Work flawlessly, but low battery life (80%)

column1: i dont like the fact i receive the phone i picked .

Phone had minor superficial scratches on the screen but they weren’t terrible. Overall the physical appearance of the phone was fine. However, once I set up the phone I could not set up the Face ID and it was glitchy. Wether I was trying to surf the internet, change a setting, or in an app, the phone would jump back to the previous page and then forward to the page I was on, then back, then forward and it wouldn’t stop doing it. It would also open apps on its own. Very disappointed because it looked decent for a used phone and had a battery health of 90% but it was unusable.

column1: A couple of marks but good for the price
column2: It works perfectly fine. The screen had two dents in it, so it's not perfect, but if you're buying a refurbished phone, that's what you get.

column2: phone crapped out in less than 6 months

column1: You may Ned t contact Apple to finish clearing your phone before activating with your carrier
column2: I wish it came with instructions, and when setting it up I had some concerns .I had to work with Apple to clean the the phone before it could activated.
It arrived a full day sooner than expected and it was in pristine condition.

This was the worst experience I've had buying a phone on amazon. This was going to be a gift. Thank god i checked it out. Besides the obvious flaws shown on pictures, the speaker does not work at all. So no talking on the phone, making videos etc. Every corner of the phone is extremely scratched and scuffed. Scratches all along the sides of the phone. The back of the phone has scratches & cracks near the camera & the screen has a black spot on it. The worst part is, they have made it difficult to send back. Often times they will have an option to have the post office print the shipping label but I have to print it so I had to go buy ink & get my printer out to print the label to send it back. I absolutely hate dealing with returns so if they are minor/cosmetic issues, I'll try to just deal with it but this item looks like I was sent someones broken phone. I cant believe I spent $300 on this phone & it's completely unusable. The battery life is non existent. It dies within a couple hours without use. I cant make phone calls without a speaker that works. I cant use a phone that's always dead. Just no. Unacceptable.
Been super excited and impressed with my phone so far! Little to no scratches, battery life over 85%z

column1: Some scratches on the glass and a dirty speaker hole with someone’s face oils built up in it.
column2: Screen has a bit scratched up very superficially but facial oils built up in ear speaker area. Battery charges very quick but battery life isn’t the best, I do use it for work though. Facial recognition is great and even catches the up-chin version of me and if I’m wearing glasses, much better than Galaxy s10 in that respect.
Phones was in great condition. No issues.
The phone is very good. There is only one complaint:There was no owner’s manual.Thank God for search engines. I still wouldn’t know how to use the phone without it.

column1: First iPhone and I love it
column2: Loving the phone I just got it today and it’s my first iPhone. The phone came with 83% battery life but that’s ok. True Tone works as well as Face ID I’m glad I got the phone from hybrid it. I’ll update this in a few months but for now I’m loving it

Phone is practically brand new! No scratches at all! Works great so far! 86% battery life, but that’s ok. Had no problem switching my number over. Was unlocked as it said, was able to switch over the phone! I love it!!Update: the phone is starting to malfunction. It has run hot, and I’m unable to do anything with it! I can not see who’s calling, can’t answer a call, none of my apps are opening! Nothing else works! I can make calls, by using Siri only. I can use the swipe down screen, to put on airplane mold, dnd, etc. I can’t even turn it off to allow it to cool down! Prior to this, sometimes I’d have a difficult time getting it to turn back on, when turned off! I sometimes have trouble pushing 1,2,3etc.. when prompted on a phone call. I’m sending it back! That’s if I can get it to function right so I can erase my iCloud!

column1: This is the WORST Amazon Purchase I have EVER made
column2: Listen, I know your reading other reviews before you buy this phone. Some reviews are saying they got a near MINT condition iphone, or a iphone that's in"not so bad" condition.But then there are ones like the one I received. This screen had the most amount of scuffs, scratches, and cracks i've ever seen. It's so bad. Also, the battery was at a frightening low 85%. The phone was not even factory reset either!! In fact, the last person who used this even left their call history on here AND a picture. Are you serious? You actually got to be joking sending out a product like this given the listing description the seller is providing. This literally feels like someone else's return.Oh ALSO, I spent $15 EXTRA dollars for FASTER shipping.......and it ended up arriving 4 DAYS LATER than standard shipping would cost. ANDthe seller shipped this in a jiffy envelope. I repeat, the seller sent a iPhone in a JIFFY envelope. This is beyond unacceptable. And I have pictures to prove all of this. Its such a tight fit in this envelope that I can’t even get it back inside to send it back!So currently, I have reached out to the seller because I would like to receive a replacement iPhone XS Space Gray Unlocked in good condition like in the other positive reviews you see here as well as a refund on my shipping costs so we'll see what happens. However, if that does not work out I am returning, getting a full refund and never looking back.TLDR: The amount of stress this purchase has caused me is not worth the price in the slightest. Don't bother. Seller takes DAYS to respond. This is truly the worst purchase I have EVER made on Amazon. Never Again. Seriously...This was a nightmare of an experience...buyer beware.

column1: Fast shipping and phone in good condition.
column2: Very fast shipping, came days before eta. Screen, body, & battery showed minimal amount wear and tear, for the amount of time this model has been on the market. Overall very happy with purchase.

This came in perfect condition aside from the low battery health (87%) which was to be expected. I did hope to receive a phone with better battery life but I can’t really complain considering there are no other issues. Scratches and scuffs are minor, to the point where it looks new. Good buy.
This is a great phone

Sorry it has a case on. Anyway I think this is cheaper than most and it’s perfect! It comes with a screen cover and a helpful guide! I really enjoy it and I’m very excited that I got it. It came 4 -5 days earlier than expected!

column2:
The battery Life is less then 80%, is 78 and the amazon information says that exceed 80%.
Now the phone is here in my country, i have and is too expensive to send it back...Im very sad with this...

Overall in good condition and everything except the phone speaker works. After not having a phone for 8 days, I was not in the mood to send this back for a replacement and decided to pay for the speaker replacement myself. Battery life came at 85%, which isn't bad.
Phone comes with only cable, not even an wall adapter.Description of what is in box is misleading in my opinion.

Until now, woks great. Face recognition ok! Battery 85 . Im using the phone the whole day. I thought it would be at least 90. When putting tempered glass, screen is not responding. Ill update the review soon if there’s other changes.
After looking at some of the reviews i was kind of worried, but when i got my phone it was perfect and everything is fine.

Got the phone when expected and came in good quality although it also had two little scratches on the screen that was kinda annoying but didn’t bother me too much. Battery life was also great out the box at 92% battery health. All in all happy with purchase.
It’s a good deal but the battery doesn’t work so fine, but I’m in Ecuador and the celular is unlocked

I ordered an iPhone XS for my wife since I have the same model and really like it. Unfortunately, the phone they sent me came with what looks like a much lower quality aftermarket LED screen as opposed to an original AMOLED screen. The side-by-side comparison to my phone was night and day. I just couldn't accept that they would try to market this as good as the original, so I returned it.Also, the aftermarket charger they included was overheating after less than 5 minutes of charging.

So far everything works great, but I noticed the battery wasn’t lasting that long. I checked the battery quality in the settings and it’s at 84% which my wife has had her phone for over 2 years and it’s at 88%. Checking the battery life is extremely easy and a no brainer so not sure how it was sent with that low a battery health. If it wasn’t for the battery it is a 5 star rating, but now I’ll have to replace the battery at some point.
Outstanding product, customer service, communication, and commitment.

The phone works very well. Everything about the phone was equal to an Apple Refurb. Battery life is good; screen and body of the phone like new.The only bad side is the charging cable and adapter. Both are off brand junk.Lastly, when the product description says “May not come in original packaging”, they aren’t kidding. The XS arrived (in good time I might add) in a box designed for a larger iPhone. No big deal. Just an observation.Overall, I’m very satisfied with the purchase.
Phone works great have had over a month.

This was the second renewed item I have purchased. The first one was heavily scratched and dirty and I returned it for a refund. I thought I would give it a second chance thinking that maybe it was just bad luck the first time around. However the second phone was probably worse. The screen was also so scratched and so dirty, I put it right back in the box as soon as I opened it. I will not be purchasing any renewed phones from here again. 2 stars given for easy returns.
Im overall satisfied with the phone I received the only down side was that i got it with 79% battery health. Its degraded quite a bit but everything else is great no scratches or nothing!

column1: Heavily used and nonfunctional so far
column2: Mine came dead, and the generic charger in the box doesn't fit this phone so I can't charge it to see if it works. The description says "like new" but the phone has noticeable scratches on both the front and back of the phone. All in, this is not at all what I was spending this amount of money to get, so I have requested a return. So far the seller hasn't responded, so I continue to have money tied up in a heavily used and nonfunctional phone.

Over all pretty good, no Damage on it visually but the one problem is when u shake it you can hear a rattling nose coming form it like something wasn’t put in correctly I hope I won’t have any problems with it in the future but for now it works it’s just something wasn’t put in correctly inside of the phone.

column1: 4 Months to realize some sensors doesn't work
column2: The iphone XS came in great condition. Everything worked, so I thought. I found out 4 months after purchase (Jan '21)that the compass and some other sensors in the phone don't work. I downloaded an app called Sensor Kinetics to test what is working and what isn't. Accelerometer works (which does portrait/landscape switching or I would of noticed sooner) but Gyroscope, Magnetometer (compass), Linear accelerator sensor, Gravity sensor, and Attitude Sensor all don't work.I'm out of the return window by about 30 days, so I'm stuck with it. I'm going to try and repair it myself. I would purchase again but download that App and make sure everything works.

column1: Worked fine up until a few days before the warranty expired
column2: My iPhone Xs 256gb functioned fine until right when the return period ended. Now it has an inoperable FACE ID as well as a non functioning receiver speaker.Attempted a full factory reset on the phone as to what many trouble shooting websites suggested along with what Apple suggested as well.Ive emailed the seller of this product and will update my review of the product accordingly, until then I am not impressed with Amazon refurbished products & would advise anyone not to purchase though that program.

column1: Freezes up constantly. Have hard set it several times a week.
column2: The phone came in great shape but it freezes up constantly. It started like once a month, then moved to doing it every few weeks and now it’s not quite a daily thing but almost. So frustrating. I have had it only about six months now

The IPhone XS came in a bubble wrapped envelope, phone wrapped in bubble wrap and a sheet of padding. I was surprised it showed up in the minimal packaging. The phone cord is really short (2-3 inches long) with the normal power cube. I feel like the seller did the minimum amount of work to get the phone to me safely. The phone is working great. Battery life came at 88%.

column1: Cellular Services stopped working just a few weeks after the return window
column2: The phone came in great condition and still works well with the exception of the cellular signal not working after the first few months. I took it to get it fixed and the technicians told me there was a 50% chance of destroying the phone completely to try to fix it. After further research, this seems to be a common issue with the new update of iPhone X. Everything else about the phone is great so it's a shame that I can no longer use it as a primary phone and am now having to invest money again into a new phone only a few months later. Usually phones last me 2+ years.

Couldn’t set up Face ID. Had the same problem on a previous XS I owned. Always tells you to hold phone higher or lower and hold closer or further away. Apparently it’s a software issue and apple wants a good amount to fix it. Unfortunately I returned this one. Woot accepted the return, I’m just waiting for my refund now. I wouldn’t buy another XS.

While the description said there may be very small imperfections or scratches with this being a refurbished iphone, I was very disappointed that mine arrived with a very large, visible crack across the entire upper right section of the screen. Phone works fine, but the appearance not at all as described.
liked it. looks good . well refurbished. sending to family overseas.

The charger it came with was split in half but it’s amazing otherwise. If it wasn’t for the broken charger I would’ve given that full 5 stars.

i was worried that i wouldn't get my phone in good condition but i did...it came on time and it came with a charger. not the original, it still works though. the battery life was 89% which is okay. and it works with my sim. i definitely recommend.
The product is like new and I am satisfied. My only complaint regards the charging cable, which does not work for transferring data from your computer to your iPhone.
I liked it very much arrived on time the iPhone is like new without scratches I'll even buy another

top speaker was broken so the sound qualityis bad when talking with phone. First phone was in great condition however battery life was low at 78% ( they advertise batteries of over 80%)so I returned it and bought another one, the second one had over 80% battery life but was scratched front and back, and on top of it the screen had been replaced with a cheap part so no tru tone capability and you can definitely tell there was something off with the screen. column1: Apple iPhone XS, 256GB, Space Gray - For AT&T (Renewed

Not verizon models

column1: Wish it worked, Sad to have to return
column2: I was excited to upgrade from my 6plus but spent two nerve wracking days trying to get it activated with my carrier. I was under the impression that fully unlocked means I can use with GSM or CDMA. Apparently it is either not fully unlocked or it is simply defective. Phone will NOT hold the signal long enough to do anything call/text related. Sent a question to seller but no response so I have no choice but to return.

The phone worked fine for the most part.... kinda.
On the first day it already had glitches with the unlock screen & momentary unresponsiveness with the touch screen. But compared to my last phone, I didn’t mind it much.Then one day, almost a month after purchasing, the lock screen just stopped working completely. Couldn’t unlock my phone at all. I figured, restart the phone it’s fine. And for a while, that seemed to work. Until after a few minutes of use, black lines just started appearing on my screen vertically. And glitches on the screen.So the phone was slightly damaged all throughout my usage, even tho I bought the best condition! But it still performed decently besides the occasional glitching.With refurbished iPhones, these things can happen & you sometimes might get unfortunate. Some of them will neverfunction well, no matter how many times it’s repaired/renewed.Giving one star for leaving me off the grid for 2 weeks waiting for refund & forcing me to deal with a subpar phone while I had it. Got a new one, same model and now ik what THIS phone SHOULD have been like. Pales in comparison, immensely!

column1: They don’t check them well for scratches. Screen has a huge line down it.
column2: I get these are used, but I shouldn’t have received one with a huge gouge in the screen running vertically down the whole phone.The description says no visible scratches. I won’t do that again. Not worth it.

column1: The phone works great, but there are blemishes around the bezel

I’m returning to my iPhone X after using a “renewed” iPhone Xs from Amazon’s renewal program for a few weeks. The screen now feels a bit squishy, and the color also sucks.My request to return the Xs for my $470 refund was approved - so no harm no foul. I’ve now preordered the iPhone 12 Pro for $750, which includes a $250 discount for trading in my iPhone X.

column1: Battery defective. Amazon refused to honor replacement arrangement.
column2: I received the phone within 2 days of ordering. The packaging was fine and initially it appeared to be in great condition. However, I checked the battery health on the first day which stated “Important Battery Message: Your battery’s health is significantly degraded.”The Maximum Capacity for the battery was 78%. No problem, I thought, because one of the reason’s I bought from Amazon is that the phone was advertised “to have a battery which exceeds 80% capacity relative to new” and was “Guaranteed by Amazon” to be “eligible for replacement or refund within 90 days of receipt if you are not satisfied. “Well clearly, I was not satisfied to receive a phone with a significantly degraded battery. So, I called Amazon Customer service to explain the problem and request a replacement. I did this on the same day I received the phone. The representative was helpful and told me he would send out a replacement immediately, and even upgrade the shipment method for no extra charge.He also told me, both in conversation and in writing to “use the box the replacement comes in to return the original.”That way, I would not be without a phone while waiting for the replacement to arrive.The day the replacement was scheduled to arrive and but had not, I called Amazon customer service back to inquire about the status. Much to my surprise, I was told the replacement phone order had been cancelled by the third-party seller because the original had not been returned. This irritated me for two reasons: (1) I had never been notified the replacement order had been cancelled—apparently, had I not called Amazon was simply going to drop the issue, and (2) I was specifically told by Amazon Customer Service that I did not need to return the original until the replacement was received.I told the agent this was unacceptable and wanted the replacement sent to me, as had been previously arranged. When it became clear that she would not be able to help me, I asked to speak with her manager. After providing her with my phone number, she said her manager would call me back. That phone call never happened.The following day I called Amazon customer service again, now the third time trying to get this issue resolved. I explained the steps I had taken thus far and was put on hold so the representative could verify if my replacement order “was legit.”When I asked what “legit” meant, she said she needed to verify if this was unusual activity on the account because it was a phone purchase. I told her that of course it was legit, as I had email documentation regarding the entire process!After being on hold, she came back and told me the replacement phone would be delivered within 5 days. She also said she would personally call me on that day to verify that it was received. I asked her to clarify that I would receive the replacement first, prior to sending the original back, according to the instructions I had previously received via email. She looked up that email and saw it said: “Please feel free to use the box the replacement comes in to return the original…”After reading that she placed me on hold again.After a minute or so, she came back on the line and asked if she could place me on hold for an additional few minutes. I asked why. She said she was trying to find out what went wrong with the first replacement order. When she came back on the line, she told me “to be on the safe side” I should return the original defective phone first to receive a replacement.I reiterated that this was unacceptable and that I had held up my end of the bargain and done exactly as Amazon had told me to do. I wanted the replacement sent first before I returned the defective phone. She said the email I received was in error and the person who sent it made a mistake—the defective phone would need to be returned before the replacement is shipped out. I told her that while I understand that people make mistakes, I did not think I should be penalized (i.e., be without a phone for at least 5 days) for a mistake that Amazon made. She apologized for the mistake but made it clear that I would not receive a replacement until the original was returned. I informed her I would be writing a negative review.To summarize: I was sent a defective phone, was given incorrect information about how to replace it, had the replacement order silently cancelled without being notified, and Amazon refused to follow through on the terms of their agreement. One star.

Spent 3 hours setting it up and signing into my apple account and haven’t had issues since but it was a pain.

column1: Iphone does not work anymore.  Defective Phone
column2: Dec 23, 2020, I purchased this iphone, as a gift for recipient, expecting it to work.It worked for a few months, but around 6 weeks ago (mid June, 2021), it was left charging overnight.In the morning, the phone interface had black spots and now has more black spots on the screen.A real new or renewed iphone would not develop black spots on the screen after a few months, even if left charging overnight.This is a defective phone.Perhaps I should have purchased from certified Apple store directly.The return window is passed, and now we are stuck with the defective iphone purchased from Amazon.I have to give at least one star to Screen Quality rating, but Screen Quality does not deserve any stars due to current and developing black dark spots on the screen.Seller does not sell working iphone with original Apple parts and accessories.Seller has 1 year warranty, but does not honor it due to Amazon 90 warranty policy.Phone advertised as iphone renewed, but does not work and does not reflect iphone quality.Seller sells defective products and does not want to help customers deceived via false advertising on Amazon website.

column1: BROKE AFTER FIVE MONTHS (DID NOT DROP/BREAK) HARDWARE IS FAULTY!
column2: I had a cracked/broken phone (Yea, iPhone 6) for years that worked better than this phone. However, my boyfriend felt bad that my phone was older and cracked, so he bought me a refurbished one from this site on Amazon. I have other friends and family with this phone, and they were pleased with the product. I even had a family member buy a refurbished phone from another company (we should have used them!!!)I had hesitation about this phone from the beginning of my setup and thought about sending it back. But I finally got it set up and went on. It was nice to have an updated, non-cracked phone that I could take pictures with.However, a month ago, it started with the bottom portion glitching out and unable to type. So, I researched the problem and did the recommended troubleshooting. Unfortunately, it's only got worse, and now to send one text, I have to turn the phone off and on repeatedly. Otherwise, it will text normally then start adding letters randomly and quickly or it will jump to another page.If I open an app, it will start jumping around moving pages, letters jumping (playing Works with Friends), and many more hardware issues!!The phone was not dropped or broken. I use it very little compared to other phone users. I typically use the phone to play a word game, text, take pictures, check email (work), and social media (even though I've been on a 2-week detox from that part).It is very disheartening to purchase a $400 product only to have it five months later malfunction for NO obvious reason. I understand I was bought a refurbished phone, but you would expect it to last longer than five months!!Thanks for my $400 paperweight! I would not recommend buying from this company and definitely buy the year warranty when buying refurbished products. That was shame on me, but shame on you for selling faulty products.
This phone has performed flawlessly! Perfect performance and price! Definitely a worthwhile purchase!

column1: Make sure to thoroughly inspect the phone
column2: Make so to test and inspect the major aspects of the phone. For example, battery, face ID, phone call connectivity, and screen. I have gotten phones with very used battery life, it would disconnect from calls randomly even with good cell service, the face ID sensors eventually stopped working after a few weeks, and I could also tell that the screen was clearly a 3rd party screen replacement. I noticed when swiping up to see all my apps that I was not smooth and that the 3D touch was activate too easily. I compared it to my friends phone and i could see that the color and quality was not there and that clearly the 3D touch was off which are all tell tale signs of 3rd party screens.

column1: always check battery life upon receipt!!!

Be very wary and always check the battery health upon receipt. Also when I brought it in for a new battery I was told that it was a "non-Apple" screen so it must've been broken and replaced with aftermarket materials or the reseller replaced the screen with second rate materials and kept the Apple one for themselves! Be extremely wary!
